There was the odd chuckle in the movie which went down well but could have done with a few more.Onto the positives...The scenes with the jet are just incredbile. They certainly rival the first movie and better them with today's camera technology. The romantic scenes mirror a similar pattern to the first movie which are sweet. The nostalgia to the first movie brought tears to my eyes on multiple occasions. The way they opened the movie paying homage to the first movie gave me tingles and throughout the movie I had goosebumps as it flashed back to the original movie.On the whole, it's a reason to go back to the cinema in years. After a long period of rubbish sequels, superhero movies, CGI movies and dreadful idea's, this is a properly old fashioned action movie. It's predictale, explosive and a beautiful way to lose your self for 2 hours or more.I think this films owes a lot to the first but they've done an excellent job. Would I re-watch this again? Probably once yes, but after watching this it made me want to re-watch the first Top Gun over and over again.As I said in the title, I think this is a love letter to the first movie and aviation. I only hope other film makers take note from the success of this film and keep it up.

reviews.review_title: Horrible.... Would rather have my eyelids stapled open while staring at the sun
reviews.content: I would rather have a herd of elephants fart in my ear. I personally cancelled Tom Cruise a long time ago with that Scientology crap. Tom Cruise is a criminal and a scammer. I just cannot bring myself to give any money to Tom Cruise. Arogant criminal.

I'm shocked by all the high ratings! What's wrong with people these days. It is boring and the action part is no longer than 5 minutes. I am extremely disappointed. The funny part is that it became the highest rated movie of all times... hahahaahah. The funny is that it is political and that's why all the hype about it... I'm shocked by all the high ratings! What's wrong with people these days. It is boring and the action part is no longer than 5 minutes. I am extremely disappointed. The funny part is that it became the highest rated movie of all times... hahahaahah. The funny is that it is political and that's why all the hype about it...

The constant drumming of "Goose Guilt" sent the entire movie spiraling into a smoke filled crater of "Who cares?". The cinematography was spectacular, but they've been working on the movie forever and had the luxury of time to get it just right. A must see for those who crave a contrived story-line trying to elicit cheap, forced emotional responses from predictable cliches.

reviews.review_title: Best film I've seen in years
reviews.content: Nice to walk out of a cinema feeling good and not disappointed! Awesome film and one I will be watching many more times like the good old films. This is one you really want to see in the big screen.
Good job. I had great pleasure. Operators, music, actors are all top level. Save for the collection. Wonderful emotions. I am a banker, now I want to become a pilot.

reviews.review_title: The Best Military Movie of the Decade
reviews.content: Tom Cruise, Jennifer Connelly, and Miles Teller did an amazing job of acting. This film has amazing special effects, like the scene where Maverick runed from a helicopter. When I watched the movie in the cinema, I was truly amazed by it, even if I don't like watching a lot of Military-related movies, I wasn't bored. In the movie are a lot of explosions, romance scenes & airplanes. Rarely do you see sequels that beat the originals, but this one is much better than the first. The budget for the movie was $170 Million, which is kinda low for a Military movie, but still, there are a lot of great scenes. The British Aerospace Harrier II (British fighter jet) from the movie is flown by the actors in real life. The filmmakers did an amazing job with the Military costumes. Tom Cruise made $100 Million from the movie, only 1% of the movie's total Box Office. The film began production in May 2018, and this is why the sequel to the original was 36 years long. My opinion is that "Top Gun: Maverick" is the best Military movie of this decade because the movie had the heart in the story. If you want to watch this movie with your family for a night, it's a great choice.

reviews.review_title: Tom Cruise Melds His Best Yoda Ad Libs With The Diction of Obi Wan Kenobi
reviews.content: Challenge anyone to tell me how this is anything but a stolen plot from Star Wars Ep IV. Yoda/Kenobi/Cruise does his best "do or not do there is no try" ad lib and other lines while prepping to fly the gauntlet of scenery that is a preview of the Death Star's trench. And the capper they get to hit a small port about 3 meters square. Not once but twice and the topper the kill shot can't use the modern sighting and tracking system due to malfunction. Get the hint Tom "use the force". The final steal is the escape in an F-14 the Navy answer to the Millenium Falcon out running and out gunning modern Imperial 5th gen Tie fighters. All in all without the dialogue the action is exciting and at least won't spawn a series of Jar-Jar loaded prequels.

So traditionally I really don't like sequels. This one proved me wrong. This movie was well worth the wait. I haven't been to a movie theater in about 10 years, until now. This needs to be seen on the big screen. The characters, the fight sequence and the flying were phenomenal. Val Kilmer brought me to tears. Can't wait to see it again!!

They really don't make movies the way they use to. Movies today particularly Maverick have lost the intimacy with the audience. Whenever something sad or poignant happens it feels empty. The audience doesn't give a crap cause there was no time spent building that intimacy in the movie. Just glossing over old photos and showing a couple flashback scenes didn't have any impact. Again the movie felt hollow and empty all the way through. The originally had that magic , Maverick didn't have any of it .

reviews.review_title: Return of what a blockbuster is supposed to be!!
reviews.content: I dragged my daughter to go see this. She hasn't seen the first one, and was pulling the tween angst prior to the start of the movie. All the way home she apologized to me and said she couldn't remember a better movie.For me, the opening sequence took me back to seeing the original as a teenager. Almost every bit of music even was perfect and reflected the original movie score. While the movie certainly is a sequel, it stands alone as an excellent movie. The storyline harkens back to the original to enough remind us without relying on the first story to tell this one.If you don't leave the theater cheering, I don't know what to tell you. The best movie I've seen in a long time. Definitely on the top ten of my favorite movies and will be one we purchase when it's available. Other than a little bit of colorful language, this was pretty kid friendly too, which I appreciated! It didn't have to be racy to be good.This movie had suspense, emotion, and action, without any political nonsense. This was FUN and entertaining, encouraging us to be bold, brave, selfless. This is everything a summer blockbuster should be! I hope more movies take note and make movies good again.

reviews.review_title: Best movie you'll see this summer 💯
reviews.content: Most anticipated movie for the last 3 years! Last 35 years if you've been a fan since 1986 lol Everything about the movie from beginning to end was amazing! I anticipated the easter eggs/1986 Top Gun movie references but never anticipated on how well they were placed in Maverick. The story line was so well done that the transition from Top Gun 35 years ago to now was like no time had passed. I predict Oscar nominations and wins for Best supporting Actor Miles Teller and Jon Hamm, Best Movie Score, Best Picture, Best Actor Tom Cruise, Best Action Movie and Best Special Effects (even tho most of it was the real deal lol)!!!

reviews.review_title: Great film. Good story, lots of action but script a bit cliche
reviews.content: 9 out of 10 because you get what you expect....a great story with lots of great action and good cast. Whilst the story is good and keeps your attention just feel that the script was full of clichés...suppose to be expected but why when investing all this money they don't employ a good script writer ...someone who writes the excellent thrillers you now get on TV.The only query I have is why didn't they use drones? Still a greta movie.
Fun popcorn flick, well done. Tony Scott original still holds strong for the supreme 80s cheese and the iconic lines. But good job overall and production was great.

Upscale Mediocre Film. Tom Cruise Built His Entire Career Off These Types Of Movies. Upper Average At Best.The United States Owes Its Entire Existence To Its Military. Cruise Plays To This Truth Like No Other Hollywood Actor.

reviews.review_title: The plot is absolutely nonsense but it doesn't matter
reviews.content: Great movie, watching this movie feels like watching a blockbuster from 90s. Plot is flawed, but it doesn't matter. The atmosphere is render right on point. Character arc is also near perfect. Absolutely recommend.
I never thought that the second movie could compete with the first movie but damn... The sequel was actually better:) I really recommend this movie. Blockbuster of the year so far.

In case you were wondering what normal was in this country, you just saw it.A pure pleasure ride witnessing character building challenges, honor for the honorable, and respect for each other. Almost a history journey in light of the utter trash been sold as the new normal today. This movie will even make Clint Eastwood smile.

Never have I been more excited for a release. The trailer is an absolute 10/10 it sold this movie to me for 3 years basically. In reality Maverick is a good movie, well filmed, the action scenes and practical effects were the main appeal to this movie and that was made clear, they are the 10/10 people are talking about.In reality the acting can be stale at times, line delivery can me messy or you'll hear cheesy call backs and it's very much 'member berries'. It does pay homage to the original but I would've liked to have seen it do that in the beginning and then try to stand on its own feet. I actually started to fall asleep during the middle act, it slows down HARD. It is well done though it's not bad, they do a bit of character building and rapport between connelly and cruise but then picks it back up again for the final act. IMHO the first and last are a decent 8 but the middle act dragged so much it really could've used some editing room chopping.... how did maverick even.....in the opening.....15 minutes? Nvm lol he's Maverick.Good movie, great action, a tad messy at times. 7.

It's been too long since I've walked out of my local cinema after seeing a film completely satisfied.Top Gun Maverick did that and I hope Hollywood receives the memo that this is what audiences want, not political messages shoved down our throats.

reviews.review_title: A mash up of Star Wars, Armegedon and off course Top Gun
reviews.content: American Movie at it's best. Nostalgia, Clichés, breath taking action and a movie super star "Golden Jubilee" who can still peak at almost sixty. "I feel the need, the need for speed"

This is what cinemas need besides comic book movies, this film is a wonderful journey that you take with the pilots, it's been a long time since I enjoyed a film like I did with this one. As scorsese said "This is cinema"

reviews.review_title: Not funny enough for a parody
reviews.content: If it is meant as a parody: not funny enoughIf it is meant seriously: how can you take this serious?The plot can be explained in 10 seconds, since there are zero twists and almost no plot."Tom Cruise trains a group of pilots. He leads the team and destroys an Iranian nuclear facility. No casualties obvoiusly, since everyone is a hero and heros do not die.

The music, the scripts, the action and the sound effects are so good, every Top Gun fan should watch it in big screen theater. Tom Cruise pretty much still in the game. The only thing I find the movie a bit let down is Jennifer Connelley. She doesn't have the right chemistry with Tom Cruise. Kelly McGillis has been the poster girl, guess no one can really replace her in Top Gun series. Apart from this, I do really enjoy this new Top Gun movie. Bringing back a lot childhood memories while watching it. My mind automatically retrieved moments of first Top Gun movie and which friends did I watch it with. Worth every penny of the movie ticket.
Visual effects were terrific! The plot and the actors were authentic. Must see! Tom Cruise once again delivers a great performance. The cast was also great.

The movie exceeded all my expectations. Sure, some things were not realistic, but it's a film and a great one. One piece od criticism.though, why oh why did they let Lady Gaga do the end song, what an absolute travesty. So many good songs to pick from the old soundtrack and they picked a pop songwriter who has absolutely nothing to do with the whole genre. A huge blunder in my eyes.

I've seen Top Gun a million times. I've waited a long time. It was worth it. This is the best of the best sequel ever!! The movie proves it's actually possible to have a sequel after more than 30 years and an evolving community which fits in our time, our society and our opinions. Thank you very much.

Absolutely superb. Slow start but was just nicely setting it up. A real 90s feel to it. Stunts, action sequences, story, all knitted together beautifully. A brilliant movie. Thank you to all involved.

The sequel to the original 1986 film seems to be coming at the perfect time. Acting, stunts, visual effects and soundtrack are all perfect. A running time of 120+ minutes feels like nothing and I would definitely recommend to see it even if you didn't enjoy as much the original film. Kudos to Cruise and the cast for marvelous performances.

Film is meant to be entertaining and no one can deny that the Top Gun sequel delivers on almost every single count. But it's so good that it enters into a realm beyond entertainment. Entertainment is meant to make you laugh or cry and enjoy a temporary respite from the pains of the day. However this film is more akin to an out of body experience much like you might expect when entering into one of Europe's great cathedrals leaving you awestruck and in that rare condition of feeling as if you've figured out what life is all about. It's a perfect ten and has renewed my belief in the power of cinema as an art form.
Best movie I have seen since the first one. I missed some of the rock and roll, cool friends feeling from the first movie and had hoped for more music, but all in all well done!

I used to take IMDb Ranking seriously, but I'm pretty concerned about how this film is so overrated. It's literally an American movie cliche, and just because watchers are nostalgic doesn't mean the movie is goodHandsome main character, unnecessary scenes doing literally nothing important for the plot, and vague dialogs... Believe me, if you want to see action, this option would be accurate; but that's it. You won't find good scripts, and cinematic references, or something like that. I'm trying to understand why this title is nominated in the Oscars, I guess they're just looking for "generic" public to see them in the gala.5/10 and I feel I'm giving it too much.

reviews.review_title: 36 years later and we're back on the highway to the Danger Zone!
reviews.content: Thirty-six years ago the original 'Top Gun' (1986) made Tom Cruise a star. Here we are 36 years later, and 'Top Gun: Maverick' becomes his best-performing movie of all time. Against all odds, it was able to steal the best memorial weekend opening from 'Pirates Of The Caribbean: At World's End' with $5M more. Once again Cruise is Pete Mitchell AKA Maverick and it's as if he had never left.Now I was expecting a solid flick, but the sequel has exceeded all my expectations. I was left speechless. The callbacks to the original movie were expertly crafted from all the characters, dialogue, and even simple gestures. Do not even get me started on the soundtrack. The opening number with Danger Zone by Kenny Loggins was a MUST and a perfect intro as it was before. The casting was very well done. Miles Teller AKA Rooster playing Goose's son was spot on. Seeing the famous Penny Benjamin in the flesh was also great, played by Jennifer Connelly. I absolutely loved how they carried on Iceman and made it so Val Kilmer could have his moment.I was very impressed with novice director Joseph Kosinski. He did outstanding, especially considering this was his fourth ever full-length feature film (most notably TRON: Legacy). Finally, I must give kudos to all the stunts and visuals as they were breathtaking. The camera work is perfect. They somehow fit multiple IMAX cameras into the jet, so that you will feel you're in the cockpit. This took a lot of dedication from both Cruise and the cast as they went through extensive and arduous training. Remember this going into the film. Also, be sure you watch the original before.The story is superb, as Maverick struggle to balance his own unresolved issues and coach the new Top Gun pilots with an impossible mission. The plot is very high stakes and will leave you with goosebumps. 'Top Gun: Maverick' is technical, visceral, and thrilling to its core. It has you on the edge of your seat all while being invested in the lives and emotions of those risking their lives when duty is called. It will take you on the highway to the DANGER ZONE.

The usual BS that you expect from an American Hollywood Cinema,
If you want to vomit fake patriotism that is forced fed to you. You can watch this movie!The simila as a guy with a gun goes and kill the netire enemy army and at the end win the hot girld and they fade into sunset!The only good thing about the movie is some of the action flying scenes, the rest is significantly poor and disappointing,
Unfortunately thats the same trend that you see in most Hollywood action, there is no sense of symathy or feeling that 1 percent this event could happen a real world,
I would categorize this movie as a Marvel Scinece fiction! But only if the hero was a least attractive personage possible!

This movie can be described in one word: Awesome!!I rewatched the first movie to spot the references in the sequel and wow. The way the film manages to honor some of the key elements in the old movie is exciting to watch and just extremely enjoyable.I had high expectations for the sequel and I can safely say this movie exceeded my expectations!2 hours after watching the movie I was still smiling what an amazing movie!

My first review, and the only words to say are "it is everything you hoped it to be." There is nostalgia, action and ties to the previous film. The best film I have seen in a cinema in a long, long, long time.
I have nothing to say other than this being yet another sequel to a 30 plus year old movie that is only there for nostalgia and money. Not even worth one star! Save your money, and your time.

reviews.review_title: Nostalgia-bomb for people past their prime... and there is nothing wrong with that.
reviews.content: One of the top reviews here explains it all; this movie was made to cater to the generation that was still young when the first one released. Now, for others than that age group, the movie might be a bit underwhelming.This review will contain slight spoilers, probably nothing you couldn't figure out if you know what this movie is about.First of all, I would like to say that the movie is probably more like a 7 out of 10, and the 6 stars represent my (lack of) enjoyment while watching it. However, I don't believe that this film was smarter, wilder, or more surprising than most of today's action movies. This isn't necessarily a bad thing, because it is a "good average" movie, but unless you have some sort of attachment to the first film, you might forget this sooner than the latest Marvel movie.What's good, is that they took extra care when it came to the action scenes, which is welcome, since this is first and foremost an action movie. Everything is much better in this regard, than in the first film: better cinematography, more interesting situations, enhanced visuals, easy-to-follow action, and more entertaining character interactions. This stuff is truly great in this movie, hence the 7 stars.Sadly, it loses 1 star for me, because for an action movie, it tries to portray some real drama, and gets involved in character arcs that take you out of the movie, essentially worsening the experience. Also, I'm not trying to say that only one movie can have a scene like this, but they could have come up with something better than to have the most crucial moment of the impossible mission be shooting rockets into a small opening.Aside from the main mission being very vague and so cliché and unimportant, that not even the creators cared to put effort into its background (for example, we only get a few throwaway lines about why this is all happening, which deflates the importance of the supposedly very important mission - just because you say I should care, I will not necessarily do that), the movie is lacking in several other details. One such thing can be the dialogue, that is sometimes better than in the original, but at other times it returns to being way too sentimental, or straight up dumb. Most of these are lines you have heard a million times in mostly American movies, that try to pull your heartstrings with sentences like: "It's time to let it go.", or the movies most repeated and possibly silliest message: "Don't think." I understand, what these sentences mean, but if you are trying to tell someone that they are stuck in the past, or that they need to experience the "flow", then maybe don't do tell them in the most clichéd and vaguest way, especially if this is all happening in a movie. These interactions really got me less attached to the story and characters; they were so unrealistic, that my suspension of disbelief was practically gone.The movie also has a lot of "fakeouts", which are just annoying after a point, and make you not care for the characters for even a second, because you know they will survive somehow. Oh my God, he fainted, he will crash into the ground! Nope, he woke up. Oh my God, they shot Tom Cruise, he crashed and died! Nope, he's fine. Oh my God, he's being shot at by a helicopter and his team got orders to not rescue him! Nope, a rocket destroys the helicopter, and oh, a friend crashes too!... but of course survives. And this is not even all of these kind of scenes, which felt very stale after a while. I know that most of these make sense because of the characters/character arcs, but I still feel like the movie is taking the viewers for idiots (especially with these messages). So, in the end, pretty much everything turns out as you think it would, and I'm not sure this is worth two hours of anyone's life.There you have it: probably one of the most negative reviews written about this film. Again, the movie has its moments, and the action is good, well-shot and exciting (except for the many-many fake deaths), so on a lazy sunday afternoon, it might be worth a watch. For me though, the mishandled dialogue, the over-the-top messages, the mostly shallow characters and the drama for the sake of drama (thinking of you here, Ice) ultimately dragged down this okay, very predictable action movie. Unless you're a fan of the first one, I don't think you will enjoy this movie more than your average Mission Impossible, especially since there is almost nothing, that's really clever about it. I know a lot of people will not like this review, but this is how I saw the movie raw, without any nostalgia-glasses applied, comparing it to modern day action cinema. And while it didn't exactly fail that category, it certainly didn't surpass an average action movie in any aspect.

reviews.review_title: Phenomenal, Best Movie with real movie vibes!
reviews.content: A real full fledged movie after a long time! With real Energy, Excitement, and the 4DX experience will take you out off the planet. Enjoyed every second of the movie and by the way the story was very generous and new, where you won't be able to predict the next move!

reviews.review_title: Did I just watched Star Wars?
reviews.content:
The whole movie is a replica of Star War.Impossible/suicidal mission
Drop the bomb into the little hole to destroy Death Star
Machine malfunction and use your force
Fly through the impossible courseAll I was waiting is for Maverick to tell Rooster he is his real father 🙂Overall still a very good movie to watch.Kin.

There is no try (think) only do!The Target is heavily shielded ... A small one-man fighter should be able to penetrate the outer defense. The approach will not be easy. You are required to maneuver straight down this trench and skim the surface to this point. The target area is only two meters wide. It's a small thermal exhaust port, right below the main port. The shaft leads directly to the reactor system. A precise hit will start a chain reaction which should destroy the station. Only a precise hit will set off a chain reaction.

reviews.review_title: Thank you for making this movie
reviews.content: Simply - thank you.This is a proper blockbuster movie we needed so much, after all the disasters of the recent years.For my generation this is closure. I was moved to tears.It's perfect.

reviews.review_title: A rare occasion when the sequels better !
reviews.content: What a well made movie ! Thoroughly enjoyed watching the aviator wearing gung-ho Tom Cruise a.k.a Maverick playing this character after 36 years. Was great to see Val Kilmer (Iceman) in it too despite his illness. Perfect blend of action, emotion, humor, romance, thrill and ofcourse, the goosebump inducing music score reminiscent of the 80's. LOVED IT !

reviews.review_title: A Top Gun movie with a plot, thicker than the original, but still lacking in places
reviews.content: I just got home after watching the movie in the theater on ScreenX, and while it certainly has its moments and delivers more than a few thrills, I think it was missing something, or rather, it left something on the table, the potential for a truly great movie. In my opinion, Top Gun: Maverick was good, a bit above average, a solid 7.5, maybe even pushing an 8.0 out of 10, but that's mainly because of the visuals and action sequences, and I just think it could have been better in many areas, including the action sequences. I cannot understand how this has an 8.6 rating here, probably too many people lost in the spectacle and not thinking enough.I don't know, maybe it's just me, but I think it needed a bit more of everything, a deeper core, that means more heart/soul. I know there was definitely something there, I'm not saying otherwise, but it could have gone just a bit deeper to make us feel a bit more. To me, the emotions never culminated, they never went all the way, the movie never took us all the way, and because of that, it just felt hollow or something, unsatisfying, at least for me.And the same goes for the plot, it could have been just a bit more complex to give us a slightly fuller movie instead of the rather linear one-dimensional story we got. Yeah, we got the character conflicts, some motivated by the backstory from the original movie, and of course, that colors the story and gives it context, but ultimately, this movie really goes pretty straight from A to B. There may have been a few pauses along the way, but no real detours, and it's the detours and meandering, when done well, not aimlessly wandering to find dead ends, that make a story more complex.When I was thinking about how to review this, the first thing I wanted to say was this is really Mission Impossible 6(and yeah, I know it's coming out next year, I saw the trailer during the 20 minutes of previews before the movie, ugh....), but now that I've started writing, I realize it's not sophisticated enough to be called that because this was aerial acrobatics driven by a somewhat thin story line, though certainly greater than the original movie, it's still pretty superficial, with some soulful nostalgia mixed in, nothing more, nothing less.Lastly, in regard to missed opportunity, and I don't understand why this most fundamental thing is absent from so many action movies, and that's the action climax, in this case, a true all-out battle. I wanted epic dogfight scenes, Star Wars with fighter jets if you will, but while we got a few nice set pieces, they could have taken it to the limit and pushed it over the top, mainly by using more planes, but they didn't. I don't know, maybe there are regulations on what can be done that prohibit such scenes, there probably are, but I wanted "controlled chaos," well, more controlled chaos; more, more, more. I mean, I feel the need, the need, for speed, taking me on the Highway to the Danger Zone; I didn't quite get it.But I suppose my biggest issue was, and yes, I know it's a movie, but I didn't really find it very believable. I get that it's Tom Cruise as Maverick, and he's a legend, in the movie and in real life, but what he does in this movie strains credulity just a bit too much for me. I'm not saying you can't do it when you're old, but I think it's hard to do the impossible when you're old and out of practice, no matter how naturally talented someone is.I guess I should mention somewhere here that I am not a fan of the original movie, mainly because it didn't have much of a plot/story(in one professional critic's review I read, they said it's more like a Navy recruitment ad than a movie), something which was definitely remedied here, well, let's say improved upon(there is a story, though it's pretty basic), but this was very reminiscent of the first movie, mostly in good ways actually, but personally, I found Top Gun: Maverick rather predictable, not that that's bad, it was just pretty clear where it would go, which it did. Also, I didn't feel much of a sense of suspense or fear, nowhere did I really believe any of the characters were in real danger.I guess my first thought when I left the theater was that it was a good movie for the first part, I don't know, let's say up to the halfway mark, then... and I don't know why, I wouldn't say it lost its way or went off the rails or anything like that, this wasn't Baby Driver, but, I'll just say again that I thought it was missing something, something which could have made it a truly great film, not just a good film.

Planes scenes are the best in the movie. You feel like you are in the plane and part of the battles.This movie has to be seen in IMAX cinema, and the final battle alone is brilliant and a thrilling experience.Drama in the movie could have been better (the love story for example is not that good), but the connection between the movie and the first one is very good and emotional.
Just to say one of the best movies i've seen in the past years! Great action scenes! Top gun was one of my top five movies even! Now Maverick is in that spot!

reviews.review_title: Good film, but not blown away.
reviews.content: I enjoyed the original, but wasn't a die hard fan. This was, as you would expect from a sequel. Decent, but nowhere near as good as the first. Amazing scene with Val Kilmer, and a beautiful send off for Ice Man.Would I watch again? Probably not, but I enjoyed it nonetheless.

reviews.review_title: The closest thing to flying a fighter jet, yet surprisingly well written.
reviews.content: Love him or hate him, Tom delivers a realistic portrayal of one who sticks to their guns, pushes their limits, but deep down is fragile like anyone of us with a beating heart.I never write reviews, but I felt compelled to do so today because I went into this film not expecting much, and I left with much to appreciate.At a time where CG defines Hollywood, here is a film that can deliver what CG can't, 'realism'. And realism is something that Tom does so well with his devotion to acting out his own stunts.I actually plan to see this again this weekend. Oh and Tom if you're reading this, thank you.
Simply wow! A great balance between seriousness and once in awhile comic relief. Sound and action sequences where great. You can tell time was put into this storyline and filming.

Sequences of the fighter planes were great, although I often felt that I was watching a low-budget video game that had no ending to it.. Otherwise I saw nothing about this movie that would make me recommend it to a reasonably intelligent adult. The story line was entirely predictable and corny to beat. Another variation of boy meets former girlfriend who is divorced with a teenaged daughter who is wise beyond her years. The characters were an assortment of stereotypes. If they were really representative of their real world counterparts I would worry about the security of our country, particularly since they were held out to be "the best of the best". It was also way too long. I could not wait for it to be over.

reviews.review_title: A sequel that is better than the original and part 1 was awesome
reviews.content: YES!! The acting, dialog, jets, special effects, and plot were the best of the best. A rare sequel that is superior to the original. Sure, its kind of a jock film. The beautiful people do amazing things with tax payer money. But the action works with the story so well that you won't mind at all. I am a fan, but the film has its problems too. We don't learn enough about Maverick's backstory but that's Tom Cruise. The fights with the 5th gen fighters were not realistic, but the hero had to be a hero. In reality, Maverick would not even see them coming. In the end, your heart will pound and you will have fun.

This movie is at another lever. So so good that not even for a second I felt bored or disappointed.So much of hard work was put into this movie n it's clearly seen.TOM CRUISE the GOAT. Oh my god what should I say about him .. .........Just the best!!!!!!!!!!!!!Guysss don't miss to watch this movie.. it has everything
Story
Action
Drama
Emotion
Good music
N the best climax everIt made me emotional also I wish I could have watched this in theaters so I would have definitely given standing ovation in the end.I wish Bollywood Actors must learn something from Tom cruise and from this movie.Must watch!!!!!!!!!

If you have watched the original Top Gun (no matter you like it or not), you have no reason not to, and somehow have to, watch this sequel in a cinema.The plot, the flying scenes, and particularly, the music, all mixed together to make this as the best sequel ever (perhaps the best film in 2022).Go watch it, and you will love it.

Best action all around...you don't wanna leave your seat from start to end.it was long awaited & tom cruise didn't disappoint here...he made it to perfection..i would suggest its a must watch for every one specially for the ones who experienced part one while growing up...

reviews.review_title: First review on IMDB and this is a gem.
reviews.content: Before I went to see this movie I was reading a lot of review which all said this will be a good movie. However I did not expect this movie to be so damn good as it was.Right from the starting scene my goosebumps was reaching a very high level and I got caught in the ride.This ride was more than 2 hours long and I could almost not sit on the chair at the cinema as my adrenaline was pumping all the time.If anyone wants a recipe for a spectacular blockbuster movie, its here.

reviews.review_title: Nice action sequences. The rest is just promilitary american movie cliches.
reviews.content: I have to give credit where credit is due. The flighting scenes were good and thrilling, is confident and delivers; those aren't groundbreaking, but still they get you to be on the edge of your seat.However the rest of the film is just your typical 80's 90's american film. If that's your thing, go have a blast with the nostalgia. But for me, I have to say that is not my cup of tea, many of the characters are annoying and their motivations are confusing. The development of them is lackluster and full of cliches.

reviews.review_title: This blew my expectations away which were already high
reviews.content: Any low review must be from someone who had not seen the original film or they are absolutely delusional. This movie captured the exact feel of the original, but with a much better story, action sequences, acting etc. I highly recommend watching this film in imax, I was gripping my seat in some of the most thrilling action sequences I've seen in a decade. I have been disappointed with much of the recent films/shows, but this gave me new hope for the film industry.

reviews.review_title: Better than the first one in every way
reviews.content: I never bother writing a review but after seeing this, I just felt I had to make an account and leave my opinion, because this movie was just epic. The original was great and very enjoyable but this one just takes it to the next level in every possible way.The pacing of the movie is excellent and just keeps you captivated and the length is perfect. The story of the first movie is incorporated in a great way and the entire cast just does an outstanding job. I had several moments where I was just smiling out of pure enjoyment. I hardly watch movies a second time but with this one, I'll definitely be doing just that in the not too distant future.

Liked it so much, I went twice. I will be getting the 4K/Blu-ray when it's available for sure. Just a straight forward story that obviously touched on the original in parts. However, created additional and new ideas that built a new story.

Definitely worth watching at the cinema. It did not disappoint considering how much pressure I placed on this film following the original. The storyline was good and the cinematography was incredible.

Best movie ever I have ever see the best part is action in this movie without any human touch but with the jets at last I wanna say awesome fabulous mind-blowing over rated GODLIKE 👍🔥

Would have given it a rating of 10 if the pilots were as handsome as the ones in the original Top Gun. I kept wondering "Why? Why? Why didn't they pick hotter looking pilots?" I can tell you that the real life Navy pilots are much better looking than the ones that were cast for this movie.Oh well, missing eye candy aside, the flight scenes were fantastic and kept me engaged and in suspense the entire time. After a long wait, finally the sequel. I enjoyed it.Lots of nostalgia, same theme song. Sometimes a little to much bubblicious, but hey it's an American classic.But come on, a pilot with glasses... that was hilarious.

Best film I've seen in years! Excellent from beginning to end! On the edge of my seat! Tom cruise was amazing! Only just left the cinema and I want to watch it again!

After leaving the theater...I can't wait to buy it went it comes out on digital to watch it again! I watched the first Top Gun last week on Netflix. So I could have a headstart on the story line. The sequel did it justice and surpassed my expectations.

reviews.review_title: A sincere thank you to the movie makers and Tom Cruise for this fantastic experience
reviews.content: There will be no movies like this in the future, so watch it in a theater. They stopped making movies like this 20 yrs back. So much adrenaline and the jet thrusters shake you in am IMAX sound theatre. It's all and out classic action movie which is much much better and no matter if you an 80's kid or todays generation, this will kick in so much adrenaline into you. The flight scenario shots which are shot with real sets are so good and only Tom Cruise can be so cocky and so good to pack this punch. The theater was packed on Thu evening and when the end-credits, everybody stood up and clapped. Thank you once again, for this last experience of a lifetime. I have not been excited coming out a movie theater in the last 20 years and yesterday I could feel my blood pumping when I came out. As another reviewer put it, I was 19 for those 2 hours. This is what a movie experience should be like.

reviews.review_title: The best action movie of the past decade!
reviews.content: This movie is a rollercoaster ride. It's so fun from the start to the end, that you'll be left grinning the whole time. Certainly a movie worth the admission price of IMAX.

I must say I was very skeptical. Bringing back old classics, just to get more money like it's a custom these days (Matrix and else), instead of letting them die with dignity.This is actually....a pretty good movie! It shows a lot of respect to the previous part and the script is great!I personally recommend.

Don't visit cinema much anymore since getting home projector which offers a better experience than local cinema but just couldn't wait to see this, so got tickets for local IMAX screen. Watched original again before going and Maverick is even better. Came out of cinema with big smile on my face and so looking forward to seeing it at again home. On a side note cinemas need to improve picture quality as even my budget 4k projector is far better than Cineworld IMAX, doing a bit of research these faux IMAX auditoriums only project at 1080p.
There's nothing like old school filmmaking. The new CGI fests can never give the same feeling. Exceptional music, frames and the sheer joy of watching it for real.

reviews.review_title: did i watch this for the plot? yes
reviews.content: The plot was miles teller. He was phenomenal and he was the star of the show. Will i watch this over and over again? Yes. It's not just for miles though because the rest of it was brilliant aswell. The ties to the original were great. I love this movie.

WOW! A Mach 10 out of 10!! After seeing this .... "Where am I?" - "Earth" is very apt when you eventually come back down! A film you can only go and see yourself to make your own mind up, as there will always be a mixed take on any movie like this. But from my humble perspective ....TOP FUN!Yes, there will be some who pick out some holes in the events, an element of predictability and the usual cliches ....but actually to use an American cliche - this film is still AWESOME!At an easy to watch 12A, it makes it a great family film if you want to get to spend time with your teenagers, that will even get everyone talking afterwards. Even younger kids will absolutely love it ....and will dream about being a fighter pilot for years to come! Obviously, also get ready for the calls (not just from the youngsters!) for a decent cool pair of shades this summer, but like with the original, that fashion will be back and at least there will be good wear from them ....just like this film (as with its predecessor) will also wear well, stay iconic and, again, will be talked about for years to come too.Look past some of the very minor shortcomings and the expected, unsurprising jingoism and just go and enjoy "the ride"! Guaranteed smiles, laugh out louds and possible tears but just as important breathtaking action, action and action!Easily worth the price of the cinema ticket, even for the family, as it will be a classic memory for you all ....it just depends on how many times you go because you WILL be tempted to go again! And if you can see it at an IMAX or 4DX it's definitely one of the few films that's worth it!So if you're into your blockbusters, this is definitely a genuine one that you can buckle up and enjoy. "Don't think - just do!" ....and you won't regret it!!!

Compared to the original movie, which offered a lot of dog fight action along some moments of sadness and love, the sequel is mainly about sad old man facing problems of old man and a not worth to mention story about a boring "singles that dont want a real relationship" relationship. There are also not really dog fights shown but just a mission that has to be conducted where our top gun heros are more or less sitting ducks hiding and hoping to escape without beeing discovered. The Hitchhikers Guide to Movies mentions this movie with a short notice: Mostly boring but entertaining while having a Pan Galactic Gargle Blaster.

It succeeds in delivering two hours of action. It is much better than the original, I loved the characteres and how they have developed over the years.The people in my cinema ended up cheering. Enough said :)

Didn't want it to end, would've loved for it to be longer. Leaves you wanting more..! More iconic music, more action, more great memories. Number 1 movie in the world right now, simply put if this was released before Covid it would have smashed all movie records...!
Absolute Excellence! This movie was so well done to connect the past to the present that you don't need to see the original to know what happened or what is going on.

reviews.review_title: Reminds me so much of another epic film
reviews.content: First of all this is a great movie & worth watching for sure. But as I am watching it it seemed pretty predictable...why? I'm thinking I have seen this movie before, minus the Wookies. Plot is very similar. I think a lot of S/W fans will see that. Overall very good movie, well done & well acted.

This is literally the best movie I have ever seen and I don't think anything ever could touch it.. Tom Cruise you have outdone yourself sir. From the cinematography, to the story, nostalgia, character... It's unbelievable.... This is a masterpiece.
Refreshing to finally see a movie that focused 100% on producing a great movie and nothing more.Great story, presentation and utilized lots of real footage vs. CGI green screens.

I like the movie, i think this role suits Tom Cruise the best.The film reminds me of the 80-90s era movies, with some high adrenaline moment where i found myself leaning left and right with the jet on the screen.But there was some maaaaaajor flaws regarding accuracy and logic:
-why they didn't use American 5th gen fighters (f22 & f35) at least to suppress the sam sites.-also launching that amount of cruise missiles from a destroyer in a blink of an eye is very unrealistic.-the cruise missile aren't that fast actually as in the movie.-Iran has no Su-57, and the terrain they used is very un-iranian i.e., narrow snowy pathways with pine trees .. that looks more like Sweden actually.-that scene were they hijack a jet from an enemy airport .. is super silly.-and the f-14 start sequence is way much longer... a fighter won't start with a flip of a switch.-also .. a plane hits a building during takeoff with its front landing gear and continue like nothing happened .. i mean c'mon for god's sake mate!!!The list goes on and on...
But in total .. i really like this movie style
And wish to see more of it.

Top gun maverick was the best movie I have seen this year so far.It was pretty great, Which is perfectly fine with other Not every movie needs to be a contender for the major awards to be an enjoyable movie to watch.I appreciated the final battle of the first movie more. Seemed more believable (hostile military flying in areas where it shouldn't be leads to armed confrontation and dogfights). The final battle of the second movie is far more realistic than the 1st one.Also didn't care for the romance of the second movie. Just didn't work.Loved how they treated Val Kilmer's character in the second movie.

This movie is one of (if not the) best movie I have seen this year. Rivalled only by Mission: Impossible Fallout and Risky Business, this is possible Cruise's best performance yet. As of the time I am writing this, I have seen the movie 4 times and I'm not planning on stopping anytime soon!! Full of quality stunts and entertainment, Top Gun: Maverick is a must-see. The call-backs and references from the original Top Gun are spot on, and the new characters continually amaze me with their diversity and uniqueness. Every time I've watched Top Gun: Maverick I've noticed some new detail. Great job Tom!

Top Gun: Maverick is a phenomenal example of modern-age cinematography. The 3-year delay for this movie is justified by the final product we are fortunate to see. It is far too common that Sequels for Standalone films are produced purely for 'nostalgia money' but Top Gun: Maverick is an anomaly of modern-age filmmaking. My respect for the cast and crew was further enhanced by the knowledge that they used practical effects and put the actors in actual Military-grade fighter aircraft. Too often are films quickly made and rushed with the use of CGI and it is incredibly refreshing to see a movie created with sheer passion and commitment to creating this sequel. I was not born to witness the original, but my Mother and her Friend's enjoyment in the cinema proved to me that this movie whilst bringing a new plot, could also pay homage to the feeling of the original.The story is told in a manner that is neither boring nor underplayed, and the return of iconic actors in a realistic way further enhances the respect given to the original. Although there are elements of the plot that are bland, the feeling of the movie suits the narrative. The actors all deserve huge credit, not only for their performance but also for their dedication with flight-training to partake in their roles to the best of their capabilities.This is a great movie in a time of over-saturation and CGI, I am so refreshed to see a movie that does not rely on the use of CGI and soulless storytelling, more like this, please.

reviews.review_title: Master class superb acting and story line
reviews.content: Wooow such an amazing movie worth the Waite amazing story amazing acting thank you Tom cruise for amazing movie. Give me ghosbumps while watching these amazing fighter jets.

I really don't understand for those ppl who left less then 8 stars reviews or those left 1 or 2 or 3 stars 😂
Guys i suggest you to stick with tom&jerry or pokemon. Because truly your reviews opinion save it for cartoons. The top gun movie deserve 10 stars review with no single doubt.

reviews.review_title: A good film, but these reviews seem to be blinded by nostalgia
reviews.content: It was a good movie, but is it better than "The Dark Knight Rises", "Braveheart", "Good Will Hunting", and "Star Wars Episode VI". I can not say it is. Again, it's a good movie, but if you have this movie rated as an 8 or above, I'm guessing you haven't seen a great movie in a while. I like Tom Cruise and Miles Teller, but the rest of the characters are pretty boring (I.e. Stereotypical military servicemen and women with one nerdy guy to spice things up). The movie is basically one giant promo for the US Navy (I'm sure they invested some pocket change to make this film). I will admit the flight scenes are amazing. But as movies from the past will tell us, just because a movie has a large budget with state-of-the-art technology, doesn't automatically make it a great movie. Some great movies were made on a budget a fraction the size of this film. I think people are a little too nostalgia-crazy for Top Gun that they are blinded from seeing the faults in this movie.

Look I know there is a trope nowadays that sequels are unimaginative pieces of garbage and most sequels can't come even close to being as good as the original.Well no more! Top Gun Maverick has absolutely shattered this trope, it is perhaps the best movie of this decade and yes I'm willing to make that statement just two years into this decade, it does all the possible justice and more to the original movie, it easily surpasses it as well, but we cannot forget the original, after all there would be no sequel without the original.I think Tom Cruise and the rest of the actors and crew are phenomenal in this movie, I cannot say that I found any of them to be dull or repetitive or useless, like other sequels might have. At the same time, none of the scenes feel forces or unnecessary, you always feel like you're in the middle of the story, you just don't wanna look away or you'll miss it.I give it a 10/10, no an 11/10, this is a must see for this year and this decade and hopefully for a lot longer!
I really enjoyed the original, and thought this wouldn't live up to the original, how wrong was I. An absolutely amazing film on par with EEAAO and Spiderman:NWH, maybe even better!

I'm still blown away ... more than 24 hours after seeing this last night (5/27/22) and will definitely be seeing it again. In the theater! IMAX, if possible.I assumed it would be good, but this is eff'n amazing! And I'm telling everyone I can to go see it!As I already said, it exceeded all expectations. Only two issues for me.First, I couldn't figure out how Maverick and Penny knew each other. I now know, after watching several 'behind the scenes' YouTube videos today.Second (and this could be considered a spoiler), I was frustrated by the Tomahawk missiles being sent too soon, alerting the enemy. It did succeed in increasing the tension, tho, so perhaps, from a movie making/watching perspective, that was the point. From a military perspective, it was not well planned ... IMHO. If anyone disagrees, please help me understand.

I rewatched the first Top Gun to make sure that I wouldn't miss anything in context! The new one is probably better or just as great! That's very hard to do!!This is a definitely a movie that you can rewatch and add to your collection. It's great from start to finish!

Wonderful sequel, i enjoyed every second of it. So many years and it brought back so many memories, shows how incredible and talented Tom Cruise is, glad the movie broke the boy record - absolutely deserved. Thank you Mr. Cruise.

This movie really met my expetations. What a cast, everything was perfect just the way i want it.It's fun, exciting, sad, but remember to fast your seat belts, it goes really fast.Tom did it again. As always.

reviews.review_title: Possibly the best sequel I've seen
reviews.content: I was worried this would be poorly done and just full of fan service. I wasn't 100% wrong, but this honestly may be the best sequel to a movie I have ever seen. They did an great job with the characters, the story line was so much fun, and it just fit in so well as the sequel to Top Gun. But don't just take my word, go watch it.

Even when I'm seeing other movies and irreality and fiction surpasses normal levels I use to say, this looks like a Tom Cruise movie. The level of fantasy attached to reality is absurd in his movies. Ejecting at Mach 10.5? He would just desintegrate... Using speedbrake on a jet like that... Absurd... But he knows it because he actually flies planes in real life, so why going along with this exaggerated vision of things? At least one thing they did well which was not to name the enemy or its country, that could boost the current anymosity between the US and some countries. All in all-in-all its an entertaining movie, I can't say I haven't enjoyed.

This has it all, great cast, great acting and just well made. In my opinion it is far better than the first one. I went not having any expectations and it was something I didn't think I would go and see the cinema just wait for it to come out. But so glad I did. Treat yourself and buckle up.

reviews.review_title: A tense on board thrill ride with all of the cheesy goodness!!
reviews.content: Absolutely loved this film! We'd (like many) re-watched the original before heading to watch this, hoping it would be epic. And IT WAS!!! It really really was!!I can't give a 10/10 just purely because there has to be room, but this was easily a 9.4/9.5 out of 10 film for what it set out to do.If you loved Top Gun.... Simply put, you'll LOVE this film. If you're a sad little man who like poking holes without taking sentiment and what the film set out to do... you won't.... But i bet you will still a bit!Go and see it, it's bloomin brilliant!

It starts with an unauthorised and unsupervised test flight in an aircraft that does not exist. Something breaks at exactly 10.0 Mach and Cruise ends up in a pub garden. Oh Please! The love interest is forecast from the beginning and I didn't bother to watch the macho antics of the "pilots". I'm pretty certain Cruise will end up on the mission itself though he's only supposed to be the instructor. Tell me if I'm wrong somebody....
I used to be "in the trade" in the RAF and the scenes are just too crazy for anyone who understands low level flying and combat skills.If you know absolutely nothing about aviation and physics, you will probably enjoy it.

Decent storyline mixed with plentiful in flight action makes this movie worth watching. Cruise surrounds himself with talent from Ed Harris and Jon Hamm to Jennifer Connelly and Miles Teller. The supporting cast shines also. The melodrama of Goose's death and the animosity his son feels toward Maverick doesn't detract from an over the top movie we all have been waiting for. Editing, production and casting nailed it with the writers making the best of the tripe from the original. I give it 9 stars but the only flaw I can seriously think of was that it was based on the original released in 1986 and that movie was lacking in so much except style.

reviews.review_title: Star Wars plot with no imagination
reviews.content: First off I'm a huge fan of military films when they make sense. This doesn't. It's just a pile of unceasingly bad plot lines strung together weakly. The script is inane at times just awful. But the actual plot of the attack is basically the same as the original Star Wars attack on the Death Star. Travel along a deep trench with enemy defences in turreted batteries defending it, then drop your bomb down a very tiny hole in an almost impossible way and wait for it to explode. If a voice had said 'he's switched off his targeting computer' and 'Maverick, use the force' it would have completed the ludicrous plot steal and made me laugh, but it didn't because it was pathetic.Then steal an enemy F-14 to escape?Trying to pretend the target wasn't Iran was also too much of a stretch. Other than the flying that's the trouble with this film. It simply takes credibility and shoved it down the toilet. I tried to like it and I tried to suspend my disbelief but it was so offensive in its credibility stretching I just couldn't.

reviews.review_title: BEST movie in decades.. Best movie of all time!
reviews.content: FINALLY! A movie that keeps you on the edge of your seat, adrenaline running, laughing, and smiling!! My heart was pounding the whole time.. unpredictable .. a must see on the big screen!Awesome soundtrack, amazing cast.. story line... I could go on forever! Couldn't stop talking about it an hour after I left. Still stayed true to the classic but ramped up and 1,000x better. I will watch and rewatch it. Will be in my collection. Amazing job to Tom Cruise and the whole team for putting something like this together!!!! ABSOLUTELY LOVED.. can't eat it enough!!

reviews.review_title: A new career highlight for Tom Cruise
reviews.content: "That was not going to happen ever. That was never going to happen," Tom Cruise replied when asked about releasing this long-awaited sequel onto streaming services.And Tom is absolutely right about this.I had the wonderful privilege to attend a special screening of this film before worldwide release. Top gun: Maverick showed what a great sequel should be: Perfecting what was not enough in the previous serial films while retaining the best elements of the previous works. I wasn't born yet when the first Top Gun movie was released, and it was until about three years ago that I watched it for the first time. While enjoying the action sequences and loving the original soundtrack, I wasn't really fond of the storytelling of the first Top Gun movie. However, Top gun: Maverick ingeniously weaved the plot of the first film into its own story and the storytelling was much better paced than the first one. What this film told also really deepened the depth of the whole story, and I'm sure people familiar with the first movie would no doubt be moved by many sequences in this. Moving on to the real draw of this film - action sequences, Tom cruise, other fellow actors / actresses, and the crews really challenged what seems unachievable in filmmaking. Thanks to the technology nowadays, the action sequences are not just better than those in the first film, but also some of the best ones I've ever seen. 100% deserved to be witnessed in the best cinemas such as IMAX. The soundtrack by Harold Faltermeyer, Lady GaGa, Hans Zimmer, and Lorne Balfe is really good as well. I won't say it is better than the 1986 soundtrack considering the legacy of the latter, but this new soundtrack really did its job excellently. Some emotional parts in this reminded me a bit of the tracks in 007: No Time To Die last year, maybe due to involvement of Zimmer, though.This movie is not just one of the career highlights for Tom Cruise, but also at least one of the top sequel movies this century so far. You won't miss much if you just see this sequel directly without knowing what was going on in the first Top Gun movie because this sequel would tell the essential plots of it. However, it definitely brings lots of surprise (and tears of joy) to fans of the first film.

reviews.review_title: One of the Greatest movie in recent time.
reviews.content: Such a perfect story line & brilliant acting my Tom Cruise.All the planed scenes are intense. What a picturization :)Loved every single moment of it.Highly recommended!!!!!!!! 10/10.

reviews.review_title: "It's Not The Plane, It's The Pilot."
reviews.content: I usually say that a sequel can't/shouldn't be better than the original. However, this fantastic movie blasts that out of the sky.With top-notch speeds and blindsiding emotions, simply put, Top Gun: Maverick is my film of 2022.That soaring sound of fighter jets ripping through the desert salt flats and the fuel injecting roar, as the familiar Kenny Loggins's Danger Zone track blasts out, wasn't hampered by my only regret of not seeing this movie on the biggest screen possible.Bottom line, I knew I would enjoy this film from the trailer but I never expected this movie would remind me of the summer blockbusters from my childhood.

The movie seemed excellent to me, real shots on airplanes but the only detail that seemed to me that it is not original, is the attack on the bunker that they train in Top Gun, where the attack is the same as the destruction of the death star in the movie Stars Wars, I thought that was funny.

It's not very often that sequels blow the originals out of the water, but, this is one of those times!!THIS movie epitomizes the reason that we go to the theater and get the "larger than life" experience.The cinematography was mind-blowing, the action kept me on the edge of my seat, the back stories stirred up old feelings leftover from the original Top Gun and filled my heart up with such warmth inside.The actors, holy crap, they were amazing! There was perfect chemistry between them and they told the story exactly as you'd expect, even better!!I HIGHLY recommend going to catch this one in theaters for the best experience!!

reviews.review_title: MAVERICK!!! ITS DECENT BUT PREDICTABLE!!! ORIGINAL STILL BETTER.
reviews.content: OVERALL I WASN'T GOING TO DO A REVIEW ON HERE BUT I SAID SCREW IT AND NORMALLY I'M NOT A FAN OF TOP GUN MOVIES.... BUT DECIDING TO WATCH THE ORIGINAL MOVIE FROM 1986.. I KIND OF FELL IN LOVE WITH IT THE FIRST TIME I WATCHED IT... I'VE SEEN IT NOW 30 TIMES OVER WITHIN THE PAST 3 MONTHS... SO AFTER WATCHING IT SO MANY TIMES THAT 1986 MOVIE I STILL THINK THAT MOVIE IS OVERALL THE BETTER MOVIE OUT OF THE TWO BECAUSE OF VAL KILMER... HE WAS THE SECOND MAIN CHARACTER PLAYING ALONGSIDE TOM CRUISE IN 1986 TOP GUN WHICH IN THE SEQUEL MOVIE ICEMAN VAL KILMER WAS ONLY IN IT FOR ROUGHLY 10 MINUTES... VERY SAD AND DISAPPOINTING... THE REASON WHY VAL KILMER ICEMAN ONLY HAD A 10-MINUTE PART IN MAVERICK THE SECOND MOVIE IS BECAUSE HE WAS GOING THROUGH A SERIOUS CONDITION WITH THROAT CANCER..... SO HIS CHARACTER HAD MANY DIFFERENCES BUT I TOTALLY UNDERSTAND WHY ICEMAN ONLY HAD A 10-MINUTE.. BUT STILL NICE OF THE DIRECTOR AND PRODUCERS TO BRING BACK ICEMAN VAL KILMER BACK IN THIS PHENOMENAL ACTION-PACKED SEQUEL TOP GUN...I'M TRYING NOT TO SPOIL THIS MOVIE FOR YOU BUT THE SEQUEL DOES HAVE MORE ACTION THAN THE ORIGINAL.... IT HAS MORE CHEMISTRY WITH THE CHARACTERS.. YOU ALSO GET TO SEE GOOSE IN FLASHBACK SCENES... YOU ALSO GET TO SEE GOOSE'S SON WHICH FOLLOWS IN HIS FATHER'S FOOTSTEPS BECOMING AN AVIATOR PILOT ETC.... ALSO THE SEQUEL TO TOP GUN IT'S A LITTLE BIT LONGER OF A FILM AND YOU GET TO SEE MORE DIRECT TEAMWORK AND THEM TEYINF TO WORK TOGETHER... TRYING TO COMMUNICATE WHILE FLYING THOSE F-35S OR F14 PLANES WHICH COMPARING IT TOO THE ORIGINAL 1986 TOP GUN IT JUST SHOWS AFTER ALL THESE YEARS AFTER DECADES HOW TOP GUN MOVES FOWARD AWAY FROM THW 1986 MOVIE... YOU GET MORE SCREEN TIME WOTH OTHER ACTERS IN FILM AND NOT JUST ON TOM CRUISE MAVERICK...I DO MISS MAVERICK KISSING AND HAVING SEX WITH HIS GIRLFRIEND AT THE TIME KELLY MCGILLIS IN 1986 TOP GUN AND THAT'S ANOTHER REASON WHY I GAVE THIS MOVIE THE SEQUEL LOWER RATINGS THAN THE ORIGINAL BECAUSE KELLY MCGILLIS DID NOT PLAY IN THE NEW SEQUEL WHICH KIND OF MADE ME ANGRY.. IT KIND OF MADE ME DISAPPOINTED.....BUT OVERALL I'M NOT SAYING THE SEQUEL IS BAD AT ALL.... IT'S ACTUALLY A PRETTY GOOD MOVIE... I'VE SEEN IT THREE TIMES NOW ON A STREAMING SERVICE APP THAT I FOUND.. IT'S A VERY GOOD MOVIE... THERE WILL PROBABLY NEVER BE ANOTHER MOVIE LIKE TOP GUN OR TOP GUN MAVERICK.. THERE'S NOTHING MORE TO REALLY SAY ABOUT TOP GUN MAVERICK EXCEPT IT HAS A LOT BETTER ACTION SCENES MORE EXPLOSIONS A FEW CLIFFHANGERS AND IT BASICALLY GIVES YOU A FULL-BLOWN 100% EXPERIENCE THAT MAKES YOU JUMP OUT OF YOUR SEATS WHEN YOU SEE THESE ACTORS IN THE PLAINS DOING WHAT THEY KNOW BEST AND THAT'S BEING AVIATORS AND ALSO KNOWING HOW TO SURVIVE AND HOW TO WIN AGAINST FIGHTS AGAINST YOUR ENEMIES IN THE AIR AND LOTS MORE!!!!!SO TO END THIS REVIEW OFF... I THINK 6-7 STARS OUT OF 10 IS REALLY GOOD... I JUST THINK THE ORIGINAL 1986 TOP GUN MOVIE COMING FROM MY OPINION AND MY EXPERIENCE GROWING UP AS A KID IN THAT GENERATION STILL LOVING THE ORIGINAL TOP GUN FILM.. I JUST DON'T THINK THIS NEW MOVIE SEQUEL WILL BE AS GOOD BECAUSE OF THE LACK MISSING OF VAL KILMER ICEMAN.. BUT ALSO THE CHARACTERS WE GET DONT OFFER ANY LOVE SCENES LIKE THE ORIGINAL WITH KELLY MCGILLIS AND MAVERICK... THEN YOU HAD ICEMAN VERSUS MAVERICK IN A FEW SCENES ALMOST STATING TO FIGHT EACH OTHER. YOU DONT GET THAT IN NEW FILM.... THOSE SCENES YOU DON'T GET THAT IN THIS NEW MOVIE... THE ORIGINAL TOP GUN 1986 I WOULD GIVE THAT AT LEAST 8 STARS OUT OF 10 EASY..... HOPEFULLY YOU'LL UNDERSTAND WHERE I'M COMING FROM THE ORIGINAL 1986 TOP GUN MANY YEARS AGO DECADES AGO WAS BASICALLY MORE SIMPLE IT WAS MORE ON THE MAIN 3 CHARACTERS OF MAVERICK ICEMAN AND KELLY MCGILLIS INSTEAD OF EXPLORING OTHER CHARACTERS WHICH IS WHAT MADE THAT MOVIE BETTER IN MY OPINION IN 1986...BUT THAT'S ALL I GOT... HOPE YOU GUYS LIKE THIS REVIEW... I'M DOING THE BEST I CAN FOR YOU GUY.. I DON'T WANT TO SPOIL EVERYTHING... YES THIS NEW TOP GUN SEQUEL CALLED MAVERICK IS WORTH WATCHING... IT HAS A LOT OF ACTION SCENES WHICH THE ORIGINAL DID VERY LITTLE WITH...SO I THINK THIS MOVIE WILL BLOW EXPECTATIONS BUT DON'T FORGET FROM MY STANDPOINT THE ORIGINAL WAS BETTER CUZ IT HAD THE LOVE SCENES IT HAD THE ICEMAN VERSUS MAVERICK AND LOTS MORE... THE ORIGINAL WILL STAY THE BEST IN MY BOOK GOING FORWARD UNLESS THEY MAKE TOP GUN 3 IN 15 OR 30 YEARS DOWN THE ROAD WHICH WILL PROBABLY NEVER HAPPEN AGAIN BUT IF IT DOES.... IT DOES..... THANK YOU.......

I have been a subscriber to this website for like twenty years and I have never, ever written a review. But I couldn't resist writing one, after reading all the good reviews for this movie. This is probably one of the worst movies I've ever seen. Impossible to finish. Is just a heartless production, not a single emotion or a real feeling. IT'S all so lame and fake. So surprised that even with all that supposed good actors in it, fails to deliver a minimum enjoyable spectacle. It's so boring!! Really the rates here are not reliable at all!! And I can only imagine the industry nominated this for oscars, because the box office, since there's zero creativity or SOUL.And Tom, covering your grey hair is so cringe and obvious...

I was worried about half way through. The cinematography and airplanes were always going to be the star of the show but it felt bogged down with a lot of pretty lame and wooden dialogue. The pacing felt kinda eeeeeeee and I wasn't impressed with the audio track tbh. I kept telling myself they are saving it for the end, and thankfully, they did. I left the theatre feeling great (dbox AVX). I will see it again in IMAX next. Enjoy.

The way this movie is structured is damn near perfect. It sets up a big moment towards the end so well that when it finally comes your adrenaline is racing at speeds that could beat the F-15 in a race.Amazing watch for anyone who enjoys movies!

Let me start by saying I am not a Tom Cruise fan by any stretch and haven't been since seeing him in The Outsiders in 1983. He's weird.With that said, I saw Top Gun 2 yesterday in an IMAX out of a sense to bookend the original film.My reaction to this film was AWE! I was gripped from the moment the music began reminiscent of the first film. Equal parts action, nostalgia, Easter eggs, appearances by original cast and 'oh my chuck' the flying!I figured it would be the usual summer blockbuster, but it so delivered beyond that!Top Gun Maverick is a champion of a film! I would see it again in a heartbeat.The ghost of Goose loomed large!

reviews.review_title: You'll feel the need for speed in this one.
reviews.content: Not only is this pure gold. If you happen to catch Top Gun: Maverick in a 4DX theater you will be blown away by its intense flying action scenes. The crew and cast really out did themselves in this one. Nostalgia is at it's peak! Love seen that F-14 again!

Believe me when i say. That this movie has one of the most intense last third of a movie. You could actually feel the Gs tom was experiencing. I mean really blew me away. What a movie. Not a big fan of first but this one for me is the best of 2022.

Wow!! As one who grew up on Top Gun 1986 and has seen the movie more than 30 times, you can imagine what it's like to watch a sequel 36 years later!I am completely speechless!There is only one Tom Cruise!10/10.

God, i absolutely enjoyed this movie in a 4DX experience. Absolutely amazing. Tom and US Navy and the entire film crew did an outstanding job. Recommend strongly to watch it in an 4DX experience.And may God bless all fighter pilots in the world that are defending their country.

reviews.review_title: Somebody give this man an Oscar
reviews.content: He deserves one for the effort he puts into his action movies. This is one of the most hair raising action movies i have seen to date. A must watch on the big screen. Those flying scenes were just something else.Rarely did something feel like CGI.A perfect sequel.

reviews.review_title: Mediocre movie and I am being honest
reviews.content: This movie follows probably 20 years from top gun 1, but it's the same stuff as before with better VFX and a little thought into putting the story of hitting a enemy uranium facility with fighter planes compared to some make belief pilot competition which nobody has clue how a winner is decided. The story of Rooster (son of goose) is crap, Jennifer Conoly and her daughter is so forced ocz we here her name in the previous movie I guess. The movie shows no regard for Navy-Army rules, basic reasoning and character development just like the first time where Admiral are treated like school principals, you can disobey any orders you feel, most threating cover op is run by bunch of weird pilots who have limited stuff when they can actually bomb the whole facility instead of pin point shooting from 30 ft, plus there is no consequence of this action ever discussed.I have no idea why this movie is rated over 8.5 in IMDb by 3,00,000 people.

Brilliant sequel loved all of it especially the references to the original 👍bravo 👏 great story line I was surprised with how much detail they went into.... obviously loved the pace and direction of the movie!! Great film and well thought out !!!!

This is the best sequel ever!!! I can't really think of another follow up that is as well written and directed as Top Gun Maverick. Considering its a sequel to a 30 year old hit movie it exceeded all my expectations, by far. In short, one of the best movies ever made and it will live on forever just like its predecessor has. One word, WOW!!!

reviews.review_title: ONLY 10 I'VE GIVEN IN THE BEST 2 YEARS: AMAZING
reviews.content: EVERYTHING AN ACTION MOVIE AND/OR SEQUEL NEEDS!! ALL THE EMOTION AND DRAMA YOU NEED! THIS IS A MOVIE YOU NEED TO SEE MORE THAN ONCE. DARE I SAY BETTER THAN THE ORIGINAL???

If this replaced the original Top Gun I would not be madTL:DR Felt as though they took the great idea of the original Top Gun with modern cinematography and stunts! The pacing was fantastic with excellent acting by everyone. Dialogue was snappy and to the point with engaging realistic scenarios and responses. Not only that, but we got to see some amazing live action flying like never before.

Being someone who was not looking forward to watching this film and going with my partner who was super excited to watch it. I can honestly say it had me hooked from the get go, I loved it. I would highly recommend, sometimes the ones u least expect can be the most enjoyable. 10 out of 10 from me.
Just saw it in IMAX. What a thrill ride. Felt like you were along for the ride. Well worth the wait. Great action scenes. Unbelievable jet scenes. Think I'll see it again.

I love the original Top Gun and I knew this movie had no chance to be as good as the first one and it wasn't. There are many flaws, some situations make little sense, there is little chemistry between many of the characters and some of them seem to be caricatures rather than real humans. There were also too many throwbacks in my opinion, few less would still send a message to the fans of the original and they wouldn't be so in your face.That being said, the movie is a good piece of action flick, it has this 80s feel and it doesn't really try to be something that it isn't. Good acting by Cruise and pretty thrilling fight and flight scenes. I saw it in IMAX and I would argue seeing it in a cinema makes a difference. The plot is thin, but it doesn't matter. I liked it.

I can't say I am a fan but it is good storytelling and entertainment. It's been a long time since the first one. A different time and circumstance. I was really amazed at the number and amount of beats and pauses and music for dramatic effect. I found it almost excruciating. An F14 tomcat just happened to be in enemy hands? And the mission itself was clearly stolen right out of Star wars. Even destroying the target by way of bombing of a ventilation port! 3 meters? Wasn't the exhaust port 2 m in Star Wars? And the whole idea of flying down the canyon, like what else could you think of? And I suppose they stole that idea out of Independence Day with Will Smith and that Canyon scene. However I guess you can't have just another dog fight as in the first top gun movie. All the flight scenes were superb! However, if I seem divided...I AM !

reviews.review_title: I feel the need , the need for speed
reviews.content: There are a lot of things I can say about this film, but let me just put it simply.I feel the need, the need for speed so much that I have watched the movie 4 times in cinema, in IMAX and 4DX. If you haven't watch, go watch in IMAX.

It was a pleasant film to watch. The music is still well-connected to each scene made up by the perfect Hans Zimmer and some others.Even though that lots of sequels do not work, this sequel has been written well enough to propose a notable adrenaline over those 130mn as we are really immersed in each scene. We never get bored...It is good to know that the cinema is keep holding up despite the pandemic. A huge masterpiece, thank you.

A movie where you are saved at the last second and so many times mav got Lucky, its not very realistic
Also, who was the terrorist here? US team flew in another sovereign country where they have no authority and attacked, again Hollywood BS here, real enemy were US.As a movie it was ok nothing great, love story of old couple were ok
Tom looked fine
But story was flawed , when you attack someone you are the bad guy not other way around, mav is shown an invincible pilot here, all the US team comes home alive, only fool American will love this who are ignorant that their country started the attack, and why US thinks its their birth right to get nukes while other dont. Stupid story.

reviews.review_title: You will find exactly what you're looking for
reviews.content: This movie is exactly what you would expect of a sequel to the original, enough nostalgic moments to keep the people who saw the first one happy and great cinematography and soundtrack to keep new audiences entertained.

This movie was epic, one of the best sequels I have ever seen, liked it more than the original, loved the cinematography, the way they shot the F18, you just feel in the air with them, the movie feels very real.They built an incredible well thought story based on two main characters, very emotional and touching film.The cast was incredible, the scenes at the beach were also beautiful, I am glad they decided to cast Jennifer Connelly for this one, she was great. Overall the movie is full of action, adventure, comradery and drama. I recommend to watch this film with either family or friends, you will have a blast.

reviews.review_title: Thank you for a return to entertainment!
reviews.content: This movie was made to entertain. There was no message, it wasn't trying to get me to accept anything, it was just trying to give me a 2 hour distraction from life and some enjoyment. Mission accomplished!They called back and honored the original without just making the same movie. Yes there were some implausible moments, but they weren't going for an Oscar, they were trying to entertain.My only complaint is that they actually spent too much time on Maverick. I think if they took 5 minutes away from Maverick's love life and used that to focus on the students and given Mav and Rooster a 1 on 1 scene to sort out the past, this could have created a better setup for the ending and got a 10 star for me.

I'm only a teenager and I haven't actually watched the previous film, but I have to say that this one was amazing. My dad is a hardcore fan, and this was something we both enjoyed so much.The cinematography was beautiful. I feel like not a lot of people talked about it, but it stuck out to me a lot. The acting was also very well done, I'm not one to get emotional over movies but this made me shed a tear. Overall, it was so thrilling and intense. Genuinely one of the best movies I've seen in a while, it exceeded my expectations.You definitely do not have to watch the first one to understand this one, but I would recommend it as I think I would've enjoyed it even more if I did so.
Really boring, lame movie, predictable, repetitive, shallow romance, and its all about showing off Tom Cruise whos gonna save the whole world at the end.

reviews.review_title: It's good for what it is but this is so where near a perfect movie
