The plot does rely on quite a lot of fan service that i appreciate at does link up nicely but ends up making the story feels weak and not as memorable compared to the original, but i appreciate this move as it brings back the original cast together along with introducing the new characters.Last is the cinematography, original Top Gun looks impressive then and still is now, this movie tried the same style which i appreciate yet for some reason it does not hit me quite to the same amount, it still has breathtaking shots and the aerial photography is much more involved, the opening scene does give a massive "welcome back" feeling yet something feels a bit off probably because the movie environment is set different, don't get me wrong it is still impressive but I'm not sure if this is better than the original.All in all this movie is outstanding for a sequel, everyone involved knew what they were doing and they delivered, from beginning to the end this movie is an action roller coaster that i definitely recommend to watch.

reviews.review_title: Not many sequels that surpass the first this is rare exception
reviews.content: What a movie have to say best fighter jet movie ever made the real cockpit shots are incredible and go to show cgi doesn't hold candle to movies show without cgi. Tom never disappoints well worth the 36 years wait.

reviews.review_title: This is how you make a movie
reviews.content: Direction, acting, story, music, 80s style just like old school movies.10/10 made me cry, put me back in the 80s era where society around the world had moral values. Now these days all movies about, sex, money and that is all. Bring back old school movies style of 80s/90s they are the best with added moral value teaching.Nice to see another quality Tom Cruise movie.

reviews.review_title: Top Gun: Maverick is so much better
reviews.content: Than Transformers because it has no robots.Ed Harris gets funnier every next movie. Still the same acting, but more turgent somehow.Nice German product placement at the end.

Complete turd of a film written by and for people with no creativity. Purely a remake of the original. The supposed SFx are garbage compared to reality, which does not matter per se but when they are such an integral part of the series if you had any idea you would just go on YouTube and watch real F-15 pilots doing this for real. Apart from that it is typical Hollywood garbage with sweeping music, "emotional" statements, and wide cinescreens at the appropriate moments. With this budget, a 17 year-old at Film screen would be embarrassed by this. Do yourself a favour and search for films of originality and quality, and skip through this on a dodgy website if you must,

Incredible movie, so very well done. The aviation scenes are just jawdropping. Edge of your seat thrill ride from start to finish. Splashed with humour, drama and suspense. Watch it in IMAX if you can.

I think it was awesome. Not like the first movie,no. But all in all... tom is a Great actor. Hes almost 60!! And more than 30 years for a sequel. And the chemistry between maverick and rooster.. it was awesome.. chills to the bone..

Really can't understand why this film has such good reviews. If it were supposed to be a spoof (like Naked Gun or Top Secret - nod to Val Kilmer again) then I would give it an 8 or 9. Shocking script, terrible acting and so many cliches it actually had me and my friend in hysterics at the cinema. The world must have gone mad. I appreciate and understand the sentiment surrounding nostalgia but this is in no way a good film. The flight scenes were impressive but I was left not caring about the characters, plot or what the hell was actually going on. I enjoyed the film purely for mocking and nothing else.

reviews.review_title: Just an « old fashion action movie »
reviews.content:
Everything is a cliché
Absolutely no surprise.The score is heavy, limit painful.And Tom Super Cruise egocentric, always guilty of false modesty.At a time we expect a twist with a new Maverick in an Instructor role, to develop pedagogical and tactical tricks. Two minutes later he's back in his plane, doing handbrakes as the other characters ...
Absolutely no surprise, totally boring even for a September Sunday evening when depress is at its best!

I'm a cynical old bugger if I'm honest and didn't care much for the original Top Gun. I don't care much for Tom Cruise either. But I genuinely think I enjoyed this movie at least as much as any other movie I've ever seen in the cinema - perfect blockbuster, never takes itself too seriously and with a fair sprinkling of humour throughout (and thankfully doesn't focus too much on the love affair element either) it's just a brilliant watch. Will gladly go see it again.

reviews.review_title: Ever heard of a Badass Protagonist?
reviews.content: It feels so good to watch a really good badass hero!I wished the other companies would replicate the same amount of respect for such a classic character like this one. Luke Skywalker should have been insert to the new movies just like Maverick was, a wise and powerful veteran teaching and leading the new generation.I loved it, we need more movies like this.No preaching, no politics, just straight up action and emotions.
Not many words are needed to explain this movie and all I can say is Superb.A worthy sequel and in my opinion much better than it's predecessor, a must watch for all.
Well put together with a strong plot. The start of the movie brought audience back in time with a glimpse of the characters 30 years ago from the first version to the one now.

reviews.review_title: Was a decent sequel action scenes and the use of real military naval planes but
reviews.content: The story line or scenes like we're cliche that I did not like. Maverick passing through the tower, the offense/defense football was replace from the volleyball scene which I thought was corny to reflecting the original. I did not like the new love he had and it seemed she was introduced in a fast paced way not to know her story with Jenifer Connely dispite replacing older Kelly Magillis as the instructor Charlie. It is sad they only brought Val Kilmer back and non of the other actors who played pilots. AKA Rick Rossovich as slider lol. Other than that it was a decent sequel. I do not know why it was glorified next to the directors legacy in 1986.

Absolutely phenomenal film. The original set the bar high, but this movie went above and beyond. Action scenes made you feel like you were in the cockpit the movie was well paced and let you wanting more.

1986... thats when the original movie came out. There's a lot of 80s nostalgia for people, like me, who grew up in this era. We tend to be unyielding when negative things are said. The original Top Gun is one of those for me. Hqving a sequel come out almost 40 years later didn't seem necessary. So. So. So. Soooooooooo. Wrong. If you saw the original, you'll love how they bring you back. If you havent seen the original? I hope you get life back on track.

reviews.review_title: Top film - wow what a thrill!!!
reviews.content: Tom Cruise doing what he does best - make movies for the big screen. Great story, great acting, great action. Great film. Would highly recommend you seen this.

Okey I had extremly high expectations on this movie so I really watched it with my most "critizinging eyes". I can summarize the movie with the following: intense, exciting, convincing and memorable. It started with a hell of a nostalgic trip and ended with a wide wide smile on my face. Just wow.

This movie was shot with very enjoyable precision and continuity. There was only one instance of the camera angle and actor's positions betraying the reality of the film, and it was a very unimportant scene. This is unrelated, but I respect the decision to keep the opposition faceless and nameless throughout the movie. This is a great sequel and a perfect 7/10 for if you don't want to think too much and just want a good time.

You really could not have asked for a better sequel to a classic film. This is a Tom cruise masterpiece. The amount of realism and effort put into this movie paid off in every way. The storyline and characters are fantastic, and it's all tied together with real jets, real G-force, and a really good soundtrack. This is a must-see for anyone, wether you have seen the fist movie or not.The especially good aspects of this movie was that it followed the storyline from the original film, regarding the death of Rooster's Father (another top gun pilot) Goose. We get to see these events play out in the movie as Maverick and Rooster re-live events that play out similarly to the first movie, as they embark on a seemingly impossible mission.

As an 80's child obsessed with the original film I couldn't wait for the release of Maverick.Covid came along and added to the build up and anticipation.Would it be awful like so many other sequels?My goodness..... from the second the opening credits started I was taken back 25+ years - to the deck of an aircraft carrier.The story line is basic but enjoyable with the film concentrating on bringing in the new characters and their links back to the original movie.A truly beautiful moment between Maverick and Iceman.Stunning, nostalgic - a perfect sequel.I desperately hope a third film is being considered.

Along time coming but so worth the wait, could be a stand alone movie but as a homage to the original it took me straight back to tbe 80's. If that movie didn't make you feel nostalgic nothing will, can't wait to see it again on tbe big screen.

reviews.review_title: Really great! But must watch the 1st one beforehand!
reviews.content: I've never seen the 1st Top Gun but I'm an avid believer of watching and reading things completely to better understand everything as a whole. This is especially true with Top Gun. The 1st movie isn't really great and the graphics, although probably amazing for the 80s, are pretty terrible compared to modern day Maverick. But I HIGHLY RECOMMEND watching the 1st one to have a better understanding the foundation of the relationships and the story that continues some 36 years later. They do flashbacks so you get an idea, but it doesn't really resonate unless you've seen the movie.Again, it's not necessary to watch the 1st one to understand Maverick's story, but after watching the 1st one, it gave us ALL THE FEELS. It was an extremely great and satisfying viewing experience. My husband was bored watching the 1st one, but he did say watching it made Maverick more emotional. We probably wouldn't have realized how deep the movie was without watching the 1st one.Overall the movie has humor, nostalgia, great friendships/relationships, and good action. What more can you ask for? Highly recommended!

reviews.review_title: I think I saw this move before?
reviews.content: Fun, enjoyable move and certainly a movie to watch! The action was great and included lots of real flying sequences. Of course some of it was unrealistic but for the most part it was pretty accurate. I felt the story of the original was better, probably because the concept was new and more character development occurred. A lot of this movie was merely copying segments from the original. Fundamentally, this is the typical plot of a non-conformist in trouble who is then called in to save the day.I also found it interesting the mission objective was straight out of Stars Wars - fly down a canyon low to avoid the guns (SAMs) and target a port about 3-feet across. And of course "Don't think, just do!" - Top Gun's version of the Force? I expected more originality.

Not as good as original, but how could it be! An amazing 2hrs and movie experience! Hollywood and Tom Cruise are back! 60 yr olds can fly!Some new faces, a peak at Val Kilmer, wishing you the best Val-when you can I will be there with you again!

Top Gun :Maverick One of the finest sequel and True to its genre .it has all elements for a blockbuster.it has the Adeline rushing stunts and really good emotions which connects well .The music, Sound design, editing ,Direction and the performance of Actors everything was perfect .Just watch it .Don't miss in IMAX.

reviews.review_title: Great cinema movie, story/acting was allright/could have been better.
reviews.content: The fighter jet scenes are awesome, definitely a 10. The story in itself was allright, felt a bit slow and acted. Felt like they took all the focus on the fighter jet parts and less on the actual movie. Also the constant heroic background music was a bit to much for me (I get that it's a sequel). Definitely a cinema movie, probably doesn't come across the same at home.
Put me on the edge of my seat. Realy good mix of story and action. Flight scenes are something that we have not seen until now. Story is reasonable. Cruise delivers as always. Iceman scene is worthy.

If you are a Top Gun fan you definitely enjoy this sequel. You definitely need to be a fan or have recently watched the first one to understand who Penny Benjamin. It is a good sequel. Got a little Behind Enemy Lines for a few minutes and because of that I gave it a 7 otherwise it would've been a solid 9.

You have to beat the best and not saying that it beat the original but it is definitely on the same playing field. By far one of the best movies I've seen. Hard to match and make a sequel without it turning out just ok. They did A+ work with this one. I will be watching it again and again. Highly recommend. Funny yet serious and action packed.

reviews.review_title: It's very rare that a sequel can surpass the original. With such an iconic following Top Gun Maverick needed to be something special..... and it doesn't disappoint.
reviews.content: A great cast, fantastic performance's and a story you can buy into Top Gun Maverick is not just a Fanboys dream. There's a lot of great writing and 30+ years after the original the team has done a fantastic job of creating a seamless follow on. Plenty of great camera work and music makes this a modern day equivalent of the original classic. If you were worried that the FA18 could never surpass the Legendary Tomcat you won't be disappointed. Certainly worth paying the extra and watching this on the big screen. 10/10.

reviews.review_title: Best movie I have seen tbh.
reviews.content: I have never left a review for anything before, but after watching this, I made an account to leave this review! Absolutely amazing, better than spider man, and that's saying something ha!

Not very impressive until the last 30 minutes..
This movie does not know what it wan t's to say until that time. Could have been better! Tom Cruise plays very good, but I think the movie lacks the charm that the original one had. My opinion...

I thought the movie had everything. It had action, comedy, suspense, drama, even a little romance. Tom Cruise is such a great actor! I really liked Miles Teller's performance as well. The story was perfect! The dialogue was excellent! The combat scenes were outstanding! The funny parts were great! I also felt my eyes water up three different times during the movie. I plan to watch this as often as I watched the first one! So only 9,999,999 more times to go!

The movie is perfectly filmed etc and I would give it 10/10 if it actually ended when maverick did his duty. After that point it goes into silly Hollywood usa-invincible logic just to make a third top gun movie in 20 years with maverick in it as the first captain-admiral... So (10/10 + 8/10) /2 = 9/10.
This movie takes everything the first one did, and improves on it. The flying sequences are the best in any movie to date and the story brings back some serious nostalgia from the first one.

reviews.review_title: Best movie I've seen in a few years
reviews.content: True to the original film, this 21st century take makes good on the first run. I can't say that I'd ever put this one over the top of the 1986 groundbreaker, but I'd put it right along side it. It was a phenomenal production, which was only made better by a really great cast.

The similarities between the attack in this movie and a certain little space movie made in the 70's by Lucasfilm? The canyon run, the little tunnel like target that had to be hit precisely in order to destroy the Death Star, oh sorry I mean the Iranian nuclear processing plant before it was fully operational. Just saying.Don't get me wrong I enjoyed it, like I did the original and will watch both again, but it was rip off of the last 20 mins of Star Wars : A New Hope. It even had Han Solo taking out the bad Guly in the end.C'mon surely someone noticed this, I couldn't be the only one to see the similar plot?

reviews.review_title: Fun Sequel Leans Hard on Nostalgia - just don't think too hard
reviews.content: To paraphrase another revirw on here... This was a "big juicy fast food burger of a movie. It hit the spot but was still fast food". Top gun maverick got to take a ton of shortcuts and leaned hard into nostalgia. I have a soft spot for 80s over the top corny action and they could call back on that even with a more "modern" film and somehow get away with it without the movie becoming one big eye roll. There were a ton of great action sequences in large part because they actually shot them and the actors in real jets, minimizing CGI is always a great move when possible. The movie was silly, swaggering, and if you could suspend your belief or even use of basic reason (almost out a love for the 80s action homage) then it was a ton of fun. If you come in expecting a tight standalone package I think this rings hollow but seeing that almost 40 years later they manufactured what feels like a solid top gun sequel with Tom cruise looking like he's barely aged 20 years that's quite an accomplishment. Fun movie. Don't go in looking for anything more.

reviews.review_title: Better aeriel action than any other movie ever
reviews.content: Best aeriel action movie ever by Tom Cruise and other supporting actors were superb.Hope he and the movie gets the Oscar finally.The dedicated efforts of the cast and crew are just exceptional. Haven't seen anything like that in my life.Tom Cruise and other supporting actors have taken the movie to a completely new level of action.The emotional scenes are powerpacked and presented it in a logical. Pete still feeling scars of his best friend's death and miles teller hating him. Glen Powell and Monica provide a strong support. They'll have great carriers ahead. The story and screenplay deserve a special mention. Everything top notch.

What a perfect way to copy someone's homework, but do it better. Of course this movie will have similarities to its predecessor, but it did so in a way that made it stand out on its own. I highly recommend seeing this movie even if you have not seen the first one. I do not have a single complaint about this movie. Everything about this movie is beautiful from the score, to the pacing, to the plot, to the acting.
Throughly enjoyed the full movie! So much nostalgia. Il definitely be going again. Fought back my tears at least three times during. Came out absolutely buzzing!

reviews.review_title: Honest review as an audience member from Asia
reviews.content: 1. This movie made me aware about how hardworking the officers of the Forces are. The courage and determination they possess to push themselves to the limit, all to complete their missions successfully is mind blowing.2. The plot is perfectly executed. It's not complicated but very effective in grasping the audiences' attention through out the film.3. It would've been better If more focus was given to each individual trainee pilot instead of the main focus being Maverick/TC.4. The first 45 min was kind of boring with the main focus only on TC.3. The sex scene could've been replaced with something more intimate such as a slow couple dance to their favorite song/ romantic dinner, that would've made it more iconic and memorable.4. The soundtrack music is perfect for the dolby atmos sound system, at times soothing and powerful.

reviews.review_title: Top Gun top movie Made for cinema Watch it there
reviews.content:
Top Gun top movie Made for cinema Watch it there
Great dogfights spectacular power planes booming the sky over the top sound experience
Tom is Tom and that is also top
Top Gun top entertainment.

I want to love Tom Cruise and this film. I admire his work ethic. I admire his refusal to embrace the latest fad that is "woke". I just can't see past the huge ego at work. The best thing about this movie is the action scenes. The visuals are stunning.Beautifully filmed. There are some moderately humorous parts and the romantic bits have some validity and power but I'm just left with a feeling that I'm watching Tom be Tom. I understand why people like this movie. It's uplifting and positive which, God knows we need right now. However, it's still a slightly vacuous, ego-driven, dated experience.

This just broke the stigma of sequels. This is the sequel we should of/been waiting for! Phenomenal, teary eyed, badass! Definitely can be predictable but just when you think you got it.. BOOM! All for it and definitely the sequel we needed. Yes yes yes!!!

It not everyday that you get a sequel that's a vast improvement over the first one. The action is great and a lot more thrilling plus it continues the story of the first one is such a great and emotional way.

reviews.review_title: Predictable and rewarmed and borrowed and....
reviews.content: Our rough and scrappy title character Maverick - still Captain, nonetheless - gets a call back to TOPGUN, but as an instructor. His mission is to teach a bunch of cocky young pilots to basically re-create the main battle scene from that war in the stars movie where the star of death gets blown up after flying the gauntlet and the super Hail Mary shot right in the hole. Totally phoned it in, so glad I was able to view this one gratis.

Finally, a movie done right! Great CGI great characters and it makes you feel nostalgic in a modern movie. I had so many chills throughout the movie even in the kinda "predictable" parts. Well done Tom cruise.
Super accurste on all the aviation details . Airplanes and procedures were better than tg1. Great acting. I felt a little child again and had the goosebumps.
Definitely one of the best sequels of all time and Tom Cruise never ages, I didn't expect the movie to be this good but I absolutely adored the movie, it's incredible.

reviews.review_title: It had everything that one expects from a Tom Cruise movie..
reviews.content: Starting from the nail bitting stunts, flawless direction, engaging story line, emotional touch and the litte romance between jenny and pete, everything was top notch. This movie has proved the love Tom Cruise has for the aviation. One of the best movies I have seen in a while (atleast after the pandemic). Tom Cruise has added one more masterpiece in his long list of masterpieces.

Having been a fan of the original I had high hopes but was worried that it would struggle to match the first. I shouldn't have worried, absolutely brilliant film which matches the original and brings the premise up to current times with a good touch of nostalgia.Tom Cruise does well to portray an aging Maverick whilst still keeping the character relevant against the younger pilots who are aiming to match his abilities. The young actors do a great job of providing entertainment and bouncing off Cruise and Teller. Teller is the right man for the job as "Rooster".Well worth a watch for old and new fans.

Despite this being an OK movie, I can't get away from the fact that this is a very expencive remake of "Iron eagle 2". Same plot, same problem to overcome, exept russians has been replaced with egos. Even the threat is the same.

reviews.review_title: The best movie I've ever seen in my life!!
reviews.content: First, I've had to say that this movie was very special. Especially comparing it to Hollywood movies. We used to see all Hollywood movies showing Americans superior and the only ones having the latest technology and advancements in it. This time was special where they showed real world thing and facing real enemy with very close technology and fifth-gen fighters.Also, the star Tom Cruise did an outstanding job! I can't imagine the movie without him how it will be like!I will advise this movie to anyone I know, family and friends. I'll make sure to watch it also after 3 years or so when I'll forget most of it to re-enjoy this masterpiece.The only movie that I gave 10 stars my whole life.

So cliche and lame. I don't understand the great reviews, must be fake?!?!? What a grab on nostalgia. I LOVED the original but this was predictable and weak at every turn. I spent (wasted) $19.99 because I was excited to see it. The throwbacks to the original in this were cringey and not necessary, felt pressed and trying to hard. Goose's son - geez, so original with him doing the great balls of fire song in the same outfit (eye roll). Tom Cruise trying so hard to look like his young self is a joke too - why wasn't Kelly Mcginnes in this? Oh yeah, because she looks her age which is great! What a bummer. Hard pass.

I thought the film industry had moved on from this cheap 'trying to be cool' propaganda for good. The "don't think, just do" mantra was repeated throughout the movie, but it would have helped if the producers thought a little before putting a crayon to the script. We must do better than this.

Was blown away by this masterpiece. After I got to know there was no CGI used and Tom actually flew, this movie became a no-brainer. And been an avgeek myself, I was super pumped about this film. And boy did it deliver. In the midst of all CGI and Marvel stuff, this was proper action and got me going. Not only the reference to the original movie was touching, every sequence was brilliant and well paced. It's a testament to how good Tom Cruise is. Will definitely watch again.
The blockbuster that we all needed.Easy plot, but can find a great effort in there.I loved the way that they made a Hangman's helmet H _ _ G M _ N .You must watch this in theater!!

reviews.review_title: The movie you didn't know you needed
reviews.content: With all the cheese, action, incredible filming and nostalgia this movie delivers in a way few have before.Cruise now delivers the premiere action movies of our time.

Worth the wait, please see it in IMAX to get the full experience.I was honestly surprised about how good this movie was. Obviously with all that was released, I knew the filming and the art of this movie was going to be really good, and I knew it would be good to see because of that.What I did not expect was a really good story to fit into the movie, even as a Top Gun fan. For all the flaws that the original movie had, it left alot of meat on the bone for this one. This movie had alot more character to it, and it makes the original movie better than it was before this movie came out. If you haven't watched the first one yet or haven't in a while, I suggest watching it before you go see this. There's heart into this story and I was pretty shocked by it.Obviously no movie is perfect, I do wish a couple of the characters were developed more instead of plopped in to meet the "blockbuster" quota, and I wish there were some more footage outside of the F/A-18's that weren't as tight as they were but that is a complete nitpick.One of the better big blockbuster movies we've seen in a while, it reminded me why I love movies. I was expecting a cash cow nostalgia type that was a cool movie to watch, but this is more than that. It's a needed supplement to an already classic movie. I wish it never ended.

reviews.review_title: Does What It's Supposed To Do
reviews.content: While watching this movie, I realized that I love chase and air combat scenes. The problem is that very few are done well. Whatever the secret sauce is to high-speed chases and dogfighting, this movie has the mix just right. The footage is shot incredibly, and the editing is perfect. I knocked a couple of stars off in my rating because the film is flawed in a number of areas. I'd rather not go through the flaws because I mostly didn't even care. That's also why I have it a high score. It was fun!

reviews.review_title: ENTERTAINMENT AND NOSTALGIA AT ITS FINEST!
reviews.content: Let's be real- you're not going to see Top Gun because it's the most realistic war movie made. The mission itself is unbelievable and the acting corny at times like in a late 80's early 90's kind of way. But that's what makes this movie amazing. It's not trying to be something it's not. And by being true to its identity, Top Gun Maverick is a exciting and very entertaining movie while bringing up heavy nostalgia for the older crowd.8.4/10 for a movie experience! Best movie I've seen in theaters, especially with the IMAX experience.

This is a good film. The flight scenes are excellent. Decent storyline and good remeniscence on the first movie. However, the first Top Gun film was excellent, a masterpiece of its time. This one gains reviews off the back of the first, which was a significantly better film.The original was very underrated, though the nostalgia from that one has led to artificially high reviews of this one. If you haven't seen either, switch the IMDB ratings around between the two versions and you'll probably get a much more accurate depiction.As you've gathered I'm honestly confused by such widespread agreement. Apparently, if one sheep walks off a cliff, the rest of the herd follows.This film was a 7/10. The original Top Gun was an 8+.

Being a fan of aviation, I've waited a long long time for this. Going into the theater I was worried about the story after seeing the trailers, that all went away fast. From the beginning, I was in awe.. The story, the history, the action, the camera work, the sound, the editing.. Perfect! I can't remember the last time I felt this way about a film. I had chills. The drama from the first move rolls over in to this sequel in a best way possible. My 3 boys thought it was one of the best they have seen too. They didn't want the move to end and are begging me to take them back to see it again. I know we will.THEY NAILED IT!!

** spoilers **The action sequences were by far the best aspect of the film; specifically the last part where they steal the old f-14 - additionally, Miles Teller's comedic relief compliments the moment perfectly and is exactly what the film needed... For me, it felt like I was watching two different films; the separation between the romance storyline and the action storyline was very distinct. It felt as if when you're writing the rough draft of an essay and you haven't quite got your paragraphs in a comfortable order yet. Or as if you're trying to fit too many points in - to cover too much ground. There were a lot of great scenes, but they just didn't really feel that attached to each other. Additionally, it felt like we were given an explanation for every scene which contained a throw-back to the 1986 film; I don't think this was necessary! I think they would have flowed better if this didn't happen (for example, the beach scene). This is where the 1986 film is superior (the flow).I was hopeful that the modern revival of this film would have reduced the chance of cringey romance however, that was not the case. The will-they/won't-they chase between Penny and Mav felt forced and predictable. Like a rushed slow-burn. Also, the dialogue between the two didn't help; the cliched motivational one-liners made it worse for me as it only affirmed their lack of chemistry. This storyline didn't really advance the overall plot or add any character development to anyone during the film. So, it felt slow and relatively redundant. Goes to show that Top Gun: Maverick is better in the air, than on the ground...However, the music score and cinematography really help pull the film along, especially around the more adrenaline-building scenes. My only criticism, regarding the action sequences, is that no one could survive that many crashes (especially from Mach10)!Regardless, I did enjoy the film, so I'd rate it a 6/10.
I love this movie. Best movie of the year so far.I love tom cruse and his acting. It evolve. After 30 long year we finally see another top gun movie.

After years and years of animation and lots and lots of CG's finally got to see something very refreshing and very real. Good story, awesome direction, awesome experience with in cockpit shoots of all the actors.Tom cruise has proved that he legend and thinker !Must Watch not to be missed in this Life :)

reviews.review_title: Cloned original with a woke flavor throughout
reviews.content:
Weak.. same story line staring a 50 year old pilot CRUZ. New instructor is disrespected at the bar
SUPRISE, SUPRISE, rekindles a romantic relationship, the new piliots are now African and some women , the volleyball scene is replaced with sand football game, ice dies similar to goose (sadly ice is actually very sick)....hard deck violations, some yelling AND the heroes celebrate on the deck of an aircraft carrier.The mission makes no sense at all...the marketing via internet is paid postingsSooooooooo weak and predictable.

I don't even know what to say in this review except go see this movie. I didn't think in a million years it could be better than the original and it turned into being one of the best films I've ever seen.

reviews.review_title: Entertaining But Nothing Special, It's a Hollywood Formula Film
reviews.content: I have no idea why so many people gave this film such a high rating. Was it enjoyable and entertaining? Yes, but it was nothing special.This was nothing more than a HOLLYWOOD FORMULA FILM, where we knew in advance, everything that would happen. Come on, we've seen this kind of film hundreds of times since we were kids.* There's a 59 year old fighter pilot who can do things pilots in their twenties cannot do. Really?* We were forced to experience the mandatory Hollywood crisis where Tom Cruise was taken off the mission.* Big Surprise! Then we had our usual Hollywood ending, where despite the mandatory crisis, Tom Cruise incredibly returns to the mission, successfully destroys the target, and becomes our hero. Was anyone really surprised by this typical Hollywood ending? I'm LOL.* All of the Iranian surface to air missiles failed to take down a single American plane and everyone returned home safely. Surprised?Even before I saw the film , except for the Surface to Air Missiles segment, I could have easily predicted everything described above. How or why does a Hollywood formula film deserve such high ratings?

reviews.review_title: That's how a sequel should be done!
reviews.content: Best movie in 2022 I've seen thus far. Making a sequel to a classic movie usually doesn't go so well, however, Maverick was one of the best sequels I've seen yet. If you want to know if you should watch this movie, the answer is YES.

reviews.review_title: Better than the first Top Gun
reviews.content: This movie is better than the first one - so that makes it good with an uptick.I did not fall asleep in the theater.And I would rewatch on a streaming service, provided it's one I already pay for.

reviews.review_title: Not as good as the first.
reviews.content: This is currently at 8.7 and the original is at 6.9. PLEASE, tic tok has ruined people. Seriously. Love Cruise and love Top Gun. This was cheesey at best. Way too much nostalgia. Mission not realistic. Almost the same movie.

Top gun maverick is the second movie in the plot, that movie is very interesant because explain the real life about combat pilot, in this case expose life of maverick is the principal character, maverick is the capitan in the movie but this is because he loves the action in the mision in the combat airplane and he doesn't like to be an admiral because is a boring work, in this movie maverick have a group and he is a teacher in the top gun academy because is the best combat pilot in world history , the admirals select maverick to be a lider in a important mision, the day of this mision maverick and rooster complete the mision but in the final rooster doesn't have flares and missile explote in the maverick combat airplane bacause maverick safe rooster, the message in this movie is to explain the real life of a combat pilot because those people how dedicate they lifes to this profession is very apassion and generate differents situations, but in the movie maverick safe the teammates and this is act brave because safe another people and the country. Loved it!!! My kid an wife as well. Great story, a bit of memory lane and thrilling action. And a very nice and friendly intro by Tom Cruise himself. Voted!

reviews.review_title: Goose, talk to me, from a 5th gen plane!
reviews.content: More nostalgia than anything, about the original. Screenplay, plot, are very weak. Flight scenes look good, even though CGI is used. Most scenes are drawn for too long.
The movie is good, but the evaluation is very exaggerated, the story is weak, and there are some scenes that reduce the value of the work, and the performance of some characters is incomplete.
Worth every penny in IMAX. Tom cruise has done justice to the top gun film. Even without the top gun tag the movie holds up well, well made and well paced.

reviews.review_title: This is what the movies are about
reviews.content: Put aside anything you think of Tom Cruise. He made this movie for real cinema fans. Truly one of the best times I've had in a theater. Please, go and see this movie on the biggest screen possible. It deserves it.

reviews.review_title: So Much Better than the Original
reviews.content: I was never a Top Gun fan. My boyfriend wanted to rent it years ago and I found his love for it troubling. (Perhaps a precursor to our relationship's demise!). I saw TG Maverick and was floored that I enjoyed it so much.Tim Cruise's performance was so unexpectedly restrained and there was a lot more heart than the slow-moving macho competition of the original.What I didn't really notice until later was that this was basically a retelling of Star Wars:A New Hope (which means The Force Awakens too) Everything about the mission mimics the attack on the Deathstar to a T. Now that's not in any way a deal breaker, but I think Lucas should get a story credit.Great flying/action sequences, a more nuanced Cruise, I'm a fan of Teller and a superior script from the original. The only slight fail was the sibling-esque chemistry between Cruise and Connolly, which is also very Luke and Leia.

Adrenaline booster. Plot is concise and inviting. Story is touching and reminds me of the previous topgun. F18 dog fight boosts my adrenaljne to maximum. Bonding amongst the team is so touching that even makes a boy like me burst into tears. The ending is so satisfactory that I think of the whole movie again and agains. I would watch it again in IMAX theatre and highly recommend it to everyone.

I'm die heart'fan of Mr. Tom cruise,he is always a wonderful actor and person who is growing day by day, it's not a matter with his age,he is looking damn young, handsome and a real fighter for any kind of situation..
if i will talk about this movie without doubt it's a heart winner movie of 2022, very touchy,
"Top Gun: Maverick Summary"
very very nice and tight story of the movie topgun maverick 2022
In the highly anticipated sequel to the 1986 classic "Top Gun," Maverick (Tom Cruise) returns as a seasoned naval aviator who is called back into action to train a new generation of top pilots at the Top Gun academy. However, Maverick's unorthodox training methods and rebellious attitude clash with the rigid military protocol of the academy's new commander, played by Jennifer Connelly.As Maverick struggles to adapt to the changing times and technological advancements in aviation, he also must confront his own demons and past mistakes. Along the way, he forms a bond with a young and ambitious pilot, played by Miles Teller, who becomes his protégé and helps him rediscover his passion for flying.As the two pilots face off against a new enemy and navigate their complicated personal relationships, they must rely on their skills and trust in each other to emerge as the best of the best. "Top Gun: Maverick" is a thrilling action-packed ride that will have audiences on the edge of their seats.

Went to watch Top Gun Maverick tonight with my son who hasn't seen the first one, which is amazing because I must have watched it a further half dozen times since he was born?Now if you don't want a brief synopsis then stop reading now!Excellent action scenes the pilots should all be given medals/Oscars because those scenes are awesome 😎👍However, the film that is packaged around these scenes is at best average. It seems like they have tried to reinvent the first film within the second? There is an American football game instead of a volleyball game. Maverick says 'talk to me Goose' and cringingly Gooses son (I know!) (Miles Teller) Says 'talk to me dad!!!'
Let's not forget Tom Cruise is 60 this year 😱😱 so his character would be of a similar age and therefore long past his operational age limit but annoyingly the man could still pass for mid 30's! There is also a cameo of 'Iceman' played by Val Kilmer as in the original, although he is now a 3 star Admiral, anyone who knows of Kilmers tragic story will think how? But they do pull it off really well 😎👍Anyway there are a few more prescriptive elements that have been shoehorned in there but it's still worth a watch for the previously mentioned aerial scenes which are fantastic. Would I watch it again? Yes but a fair part of the 2hours 11 minutes will be fast forwarded (of course I'm buying the BlueRay!)Plagiarism, almost but still enough duplication from the first one to make me lower the score from an otherwise excellent aerial action movie, my son who hasn't seen the original scored it a 9.

Start to the end, for anyone, who has watched the 30+ year old part 1( going by approx. Timeline), this is a great watch and filled with goosebumps vibes across! For any movie to have a sequel some few decades down the line, Tom Cruise still feels the same young, energetic, "aviators " and "motorcycle " inspiring character!Hats off to him, the crew, the direction, this sequel definitely serves to be one of the best movies of 2022!The sound and video are just too good and I'm guessing a lot of scenes must have been done by Tom Cruise himself.You have a Dolby Atmos at home- Icing on the cake for you!

reviews.review_title: Great follow up to agreat original
reviews.content: Other directors take note, this is how you make a great follow up to a classic movie. Great characters and a relationship between Maverick and Rooster that makes sense and is believable. Loved every minute of it.

So, give Goose's son the same moustache as Goose? Okay. Make him play the piano? Mmmkay... But make him wear the exact same style Hawaï shirts? No..!Overall the plot was pretty outrageous. Surivive a mach10+ crash? Birds in the engine right at that moment? Steal an old aircraft, get away with it and all is good? Lol...I liked what they did with the relationship between Maverick and Iceman and Tom Cruise acted well. Plane shots and action sequences were good. But current #55 best movie ever: not by a long shot i.m.o.

I recently saw Top Gun: Maverick on a XD screen with high def sound and a extra large screen. It made the experience truly amazing! Everything in the movie was first rate. If this movie doesn't receive some Academy Awards it will be a shock! Tom Cruse and the rest of the cast gave excellent performances. The direction and special effects were top notch as well.

reviews.review_title: Just one of those epic films, that you must watch!
reviews.content: The crew really did capture the most true-to-life fighter pilot experience whilst maintaining an amazing storyline!When it's hard to take your eyes off, goosebumps throughout scenes and you re-watch the film a few times within the same week - it speaks for itself.The execution of this film could not have been ever-more precise with huge credit to the actors and actresses that played their characters to a truly high standard.There's one problem when you watch great films like Top Gun: Maverick - it's hard to like another!The best film in 2022, in my opinion... Congratulations to the production and cast involved... I wish to be part of the next one.

At the beginning of the movie, I was fascinated by how realistic the movie is, jets, engines, flare, combat, stunt, mountain, and sky. I have never seen a movie containing all these elements together, it's just incredible. I was wondering if it is a real jet in the movie, I guess it is coz it feels absolutely real. The plot was flawless, just like the theme song of this movie, You take my breath away. It's almost like a Mission Impossible movie but in F18 Jet. When Tom Cruise seemed sacrifice during the mission, tears run into my eyes, I am so moved, luckily he survived in the end. This movie is rooted in American patriotism, but I won't feel awkward comparing it to War Wolf. Instead, I truly felt proud of these great aviators, I wish I am a real American with an American passport at the time.
Best sequel in the last 20 years. Significantly better story flow and cinematography compared to the original. I wasn't an OG Top Gun fan but I love the new one.

36 years is a long time wait but Top Gun: Maverick delivers for both new and returning audiences in a sequel that is superior to the original 1986 box office hit. As executive producer for the film, Cruise's insistence on authenticity and excellence are on display throughout the film. Audience response has been nothing short of phenomenal, earning over $1.4 billion at the box office to date.As the film opens, viewers discover that Pete Mitchell (aka Maverick) has aged but he's still the Maverick. Ignoring orders from his CEO, Maverick skips an intermediate stealth fighter test and switches directly to the project final objective target (Mach 10) to save the project and succeeds but at the cost of the aircraft which explodes. Fully expecting dismissal by commanding RAdm in charge of the project, Maverick is informed he has been reassigned to Fightertown USA (Top Gun Training School) instead.A secret mission is necessary to eliminate a uranium refining complex being developed against international sanctions in an underground location within a mountain that's due to start receiving nuclear materials within 3 weeks by a rogue Nation. The mission will involve a low-level approach under enemy radar thru a winding narrow corridor heavily defended by SAMs on both sides followed by an extreme ingress and egress with massive g-forces while targeting a minuscule drop zone requiring a precise strike not once but twice to have any prospect of success. An impossible mission. Sounds like a job for Ethan Hunt but Maverick will have to do. What! Typical military intelligence. The pilot best suited for this mission is tasked with training other Top Gun grads to complete the objective. To succeed Maverick will have to resort to unorthodox training techniques to develop personnel who function as a team and think outside the book. His role is complicated by the inclusion of the son (Rooster) of his deceased best friend (Goose) on the training roster.Top Gun: Maverick succeeds in every level possible. It utilizes all the best elements of the original while updating the story relatable to today's audiences. Cruise has committed every resource to this personal project. Guess who really owns that WWII vintage Mustang in Maverick's hangar? Did the Cruise missiles come from that same source? Probably not. The visuals are excellent throughout (example: Darkstar test flight). Never have computer screen simulations been so exhilarating. The musical score which includes themes from the original film augmented by classic and current songs should satisfy viewers young and old. And the movie also injects humor into the film regularly to offset the more serious themes.Cruise fully committed himself to his signature role as Maverick eliminating the cockiness of the youthful character for a more measured performance but retaining his rep as a 'maverick'' at critical moments within the structure of the story. Not only does Maverick have to contend with his own morality, obstinate superiors, and the eventual end of his flight career but he also wrestles with his guilt over Goose's death, along with potential casualties among his trainees if he fails as an instructor (especially Rooster, because it involves a promise). Flying jets is easy. Making life and death decisions for your charges is gut-wrenching. Will Maverick ever be able to form long-term relationships with the opposite sex or just die alone?Cruise's performance is backed by the entire cast including Ed Harris (Cain to Maverick's Able), Jon Hamm (Cyclone), Charles Parnell (Warlock) and Bashir Salahuddin (Hondo) with newcomers Monica Barbaro (Phoenix), Glen Powell (Hangman) and Miles Teller (Rooster) shining among the mission's Top Gun candidates. Jennifer Connelly as Maverick's old flame, Penny, is believable in a romance targeted for mature audiences which rates almost a PG rating. As the only returning member from the 1986 hit, Val Kilmer's gives a touching performance (to anyone who's aware of Kilmer's real-life medical plight) as Maverick's confident and 'guardian angel' Iceman (Adm. Kazansky).The Mission Impossible overtones are as obvious as is the nature of Mavericks Day job which is really a risky business. Wait! Doesn't Penny's Porsche bear a striking resemblance to the same vehicle from Cruise's 1st hit in 1983? Maybe. And doesn't the climatic mission run strongly mimic the attack on the Death Star in Star Wars: ANH? The fighters must maneuver thru a narrow corridor lined with weaponry to deliver a surgically precise strike on a minute target not once but twice. Was that Obi Wan imploring Rooster to trust his instincts or maybe Jedi master Maverick on the headphones? 'Use the (Naval Air) force, Rooster'. Whatever! The film exceeded all expectations, so I give Top Gun: Maverick 11 stars out of 10 stars.On a casting note: Was Ryan Gosling ever contacted about a certain pivotal role? Just curious.

Wow! That was definitely worth the wait. What an adrenaline pumping good time. This movie had just the right amount of nostalgia and a much more well developed story line than the original. No spoilers here, you'll have to see it yourself.

If you take this for what it is, a sequel to a movie released in 1986, it is perfection. Tom Cruise was 24 years old in the original Top Gun, and looks like a day hasn't passed at 60 years old!The tone, format, film angles, romance treatment, beach football team-building montage, and action sequences are exactly like the original.Truly nostalgia at its best.Speaking of Tom Cruise at 60. The character Rose, played by Betty White, on the Golden Girls was 55 years old according to the show. Can you imagine Tom Cruise romancing Rose from the Golden Girls?!?I didn't really plan on watching this movie, but I'm so glad I did. Perfection! (Probably more so if your familiar with the original. )

I watched this movie on the big screen in The Netherlands and I was quite impressed. It is rare for sequels to be as good as the original, but in this case it certainly is. It is tense, exciting and there is some emotion involved. The are plenty of references to the original movie from 1986 and the music works well. And everyone will feel the same about Tom Cruise and Jennifer Connely: they look amazing for their age. Jennifer makes a good replacement for the original actress that played Penny. Tom Cruise is as charming as ever and the others are fine actors.I will not rate this move 10 out of 10, like many others. Some may still be in the adrenaline rush created by the movie. It is a good movie, maybe even the best of 2022. 8 out of 10 for me.
Hits the sweet spot between nostalgia and a progression of the original film. The same but somehow different. Strap yourself in and enjoy the thrill ride.

So the movie was recently released for streaming. I watched it in 4k and I loved it. I can only imagine what it must have felt like in the theaters, especially all the flying scenes. Tom cruise was awesome. Likely best movie of the year.

Maverick is an epic plane movie and has many brilliant aspects of the original. In m opinion it's even better than the Original Movie from the 1980's. The cinematography is epic and puts filmmaking combined whit planes on another level.The thing that i dislike about the movie is the story, because it's very basic and not special.Overall i would say it's one of the best movies this year (definitely top 10) and it's one of the best Tom Cruise movies we've ever seen on the big screen.

Normally these reboots can't touch the original. Top Gun was a different time and a different world. However, this film was epic and the story was fun and captivating.I expected a lot of gratuitous shirtless beach volleyball and cheesy one-liners. It may have included a little bit of that stuff, but for the most part, it didn't rely as heavily on nostalgia as you might think.Miles Teller is great in this film! Tom Cruise is Tom Cruise.Great special effects and aerial scenes. The scenes with the actors inside the jets were unreal! You definitely need a big screen for this. Don't cheap out!

Best movie of the decade! It had great acting by all actor and actress, a wonderful storyline with lots of references to the first movie, action, patritotism, emotions, and cinematography that's Oscar worthy. I've seen it several times and will be buying the DVD asap. This movie is just awesome all around. It is hard to find a flaw in it. A perfect sequel.Bgm is awesome and I got goosebump, and I'm listening that 2 sound tracks of one republic and lady gaga every day.. if it's release again in theatres I'm ready to watch it in theatres again and again
Finally I can say its a Oscar worthy movie ..

reviews.review_title: Best of All Air Power Movies
reviews.content: Tom Cruise and other rock the Air Power Movie.... Top Gun remain Top Gun..... A real good movie... Must watch list. Background sound and cinematography apart from acting of Tom Cruise which is really best like old wine.

reviews.review_title: The 30 year sequel that seems like a 2 year one
reviews.content: Was anticipating a money making sequel that was trying to sell the name Top Gun, what I saw was non stop action movie that in some way exceeds the original. The story masterfully builds off the original. For any one who has not seen the original Top Gun you will have very minor questions, for those that have it will be a walk down memory lane with an old friend.

reviews.review_title: 100% Spoiler free "thoughts" on Top Gun: Maverick
reviews.content: I am Not a movie critic...I am a movie loverIn one word if you don't read more...PerfectI was lucky enough to go see the early screening of this at an amazing sounding Dolby Cinema.This is a true throwback "summer blockbuster". I am a lover of all the MCU/DC movies and REALLY enjoy those...however, this just brings you back to something I never truly realized I have been missing the last 10 years or so. To give you an idea of MY favorite "blockbuster" style movies, I would say Interstellar, Mad Max: Fury Road, The Dark Knight, LOTR, Logan, Infinity wars, Winter Soldier, Blade Runner 2049, Avatar, Jurassic Park, T2, Aliens all are at the top. This movie safely falls into that list now. This is the rare movie that even bests the very good original...this is the new T2, Aliens, Winter Soldier, The Dark Knight...The "feel" of this movie is almost identical of the original Top Gun (music included..thank you!) but kicked up a notch...but in a VERY good way...nothing is forced. It has the unbelievable adrenaline rush when needed, it is funny when it is needed, it is touching when needed. The pacing is perfect, the acting is perfect. It will make you laugh, it will make you get a little teary-eyed, it will make your jaw drop, it will make you cheer, it will make you look at the people next to you just to give them a big smile/grin, it will make you think "wow I have missed movies like this...and wow I LOVE movies!"This movie is NOT meant to be streamed, or wait till it comes out on 4K (at least for the 1st watch). Please..please...PLEASE go see this at the best theater you can find (IMAX, Dolby Cinema, XD...) Yes, it will cost you more, but it is 100% worth it. I am VERY fortunate to have a pretty amazing HT that sounds better than most theaters (Even if they sell it for 3 times the usual 4K price..It is a day one/pre-order must own)...however, if I had the option to get this hard copy 4k/Atmos disk TODAY and screen it at home for all my friends/family, I'd still say no and tell them all to go to the theater to experience like it was meant to be...ENJOY!!!

reviews.review_title: Superb Movie - See in the Cinema
reviews.content: I thoroughly enjoyed the movie, great flight scenes, great action scenes, great acting, great use of humour. Unfortunately I didn't get to see it on a maxx screen, if I have the opportunity to see it on an even bigger screen with better sound I'll take it.Overall a 10, but see it in the cinema.

What an amazing masterpiece !!I would say its one of the best movies in the last years and better than the first part.For sure this movie will be getting on the list of Movies to watch over and over again.

I'm baffled by this film's popularity. Apart from some cool flight scenes (which get tiresome pretty quickly), this sad excuse for a film has nothing to offer but "remember that?" references to the first film, unearned sentimentality and the gruesome spectacle of whatever is lurking in Tom Cruise's eyes.

reviews.review_title: Everything you'd want in a sequel!
reviews.content: This movie has everything you'd ever want in a sequel especially if you love the original Top Gun. Tom Cruise is outstanding reprising his role as Pete "Maverick" Mitchell. The flying scenes are now the gold standard for movies, they are amazing. As soon as the movie started I was instantly transported back to a kid in the mid-80's. With so many movies nowadays being political, this one is not, it's a good old fashioned action flick that is entertaining and hits you in the heartstrings.

reviews.review_title: OMG amazing and probably better than the Original
reviews.content: I just relived my youth As a 40 Year Old. From the opening scene to the end credits this film delivers on all fronts. Just go and see it!!! It's awesome and better than the original. Oh and download the theme music for the drive home afterwards you'll only wish your car could fly at the end.

reviews.review_title: Slow and sterile start but good end
reviews.content: Too quiet, no humourNot enough character interaction...Beginning on carrier suddenly went to a lone hangar where it was dead with Maverick working on a P-51Instead of keeping the pace of the film from the initial carrier scene and interacting with a foreign nation fighter's etc....This is poor.It plays more like a B grade TV movie.The movie is "too sterile".....There is no humour, no jokes and Ed Harris comes in to play the Admiral even his character is very quiet and calm, no fun!!!17 minutes in and at a board room meeting at San Diego Top Gun and everyone is so serious and there is no personal interaction. Just pure Navy Officer tripe when this was totally ig owed during the dark star test previously. Riding up to Dark star in his motorbike.I doubt real test pilots do this.The Top Gun movie from 1986 actually followed pretty closely to real life apart from the prank of buzzing the tower.... but even then that happens in real life.I'm expecting a reasonable story here....Where the first movie kept up a fun and jokey pace where character interaction was a priority.Now it's absolutely weak, non existent.The music is the same and that is the only plus at the moment, apart from Tom Cruise.Compared to Dunkirk, 1917 and 13 Hours, Top Gun Maverick has had an extremely poor beginning. All those movies had excellent character interaction.This one seems to be about Tom Cruise or the creators were too scared to bring in the thing that worked in the original top Gun!!The character interaction humour, teasing, jokes, insults, etc....We aren't at the half hour mark yet, but we missed on keeping a good pace with after the carrier scene at the start and the bar scene...let's hope that can be carried over and maybe save this.No Goose too...We just need to get characters!!! Sad!!!About the 25th minute we actually progress into character development.We soon find out one of the central themes of the movie is from the original.Whilst the training scenes in the hour before the mission leave a bit to be desired, they aren't bad, but I think never can equal the amazing cinematography of the original. Or maybe i just miss the F14s and the F18s even Super Hornets don't cut it as they can't do Mach 2.But slowly the film picks up steam.Compared to the original it was a slow and quiet start indeed.But towards the end the reward will come.The authenticity of the enemy fighters really did trump the first one and deserves full marks.Hopefully they can do what Star wars creator George Lucas's did and go back and refine the original film hopefully using the Mig 29 as an emery rather than a US fighter (F-5) painted in Russian colours.Spoiler alertThe theme develops in the end with Gooses son and really does a good job with mending brokenness from the first when Goose died.Whilst the film is a little light on humour... once you get past the first quarter of the film, the first half hour, it does come together nicely.Although I'm quite critical of the beginning and would have liked to have seen a bit of enemy fighter "dialogue" as in manoeuvres after the carrier scene, it was creative genius to use a test platform taking the next number of the SR-71 Blackbird, namely the "SR-72", the Darkstar.The film Top Gun Maverick gets an 8.1/10 for me. Even though the Officers above Maverick weren't that great, the film worked. I guess Tom Cruise carried it with a few others.If you went on the first half hour it would have been a 4 or 5/10.Spoiler alertThere is a nice surprise in the ending for those who are mighty fans of the F-14.......

This is the best movie I've ever seen, and I've seen a tonne of movies. It makes reference to the original in a way which is nostalgic, but not so much that it's the same movie all over again.Top Gun: Maverick will have you on the edge of your seat and clenching your fists from start to finish with the incredible stunt work and gripping story.It's perfectly balanced and so much more than just another action movie.

I won't hide, I went with high expectations into seeing this movie. And maybe this was a mistake, because it's truly not a bad movie. But it's definitely preying on nostalgy and is more like a Marvel superhero movie than like a contemporary movie about what it is to be a fighter pilot. There were scenes which made even me cringe, and I'm not an expect pilot, but I have some idea about how thermodynamics work.So if you like respawns of 80s movies like Die Hard - this one is definitely one of the better ones. But if you, like me, got used to movies being a bit smarter these days and paying more attention to detail - I think this one might be something you don't necessarily need to spend your 2 hours of free time on.

Was hoping for so much more. Found it to be uninspired and very predictable. I understand including homages to an original film, but they were overused to a a point of being tiresome. The "mission" and it's "threats" required such a suspension of reality as to be ridiculous.

Do not get the hype and all good reviews. Just an other action movie with the plot that is clear once you start watching it.What I liked that it is made just the same way like old movies were made back in a day.
A little "Take my breath away" ........Maybe it could be used the final scane music.....The movie is perfect......Thank you to everyone involved....we waited a long time.

Honestly a brilliant film with a good storyline following through out the film. Relates to Top Gun but doesn't rely heavily and only go back to the first Top Gun. A good storyline between Maverick and Rooster and a emotional ending and happy ending. 9/10.
A very worthy followup and a must see if you watched the original. If you didn't you will miss a few laughs and part of the storyline in this sequel will be confusing.

reviews.review_title: Absolutely amazing! Best film I've watched in years.
reviews.content: Top Gun: Maverick is THE BEST film (let alone aviation film) I've watched in years and years. It was my dream to watch this with my dad (retired pilot) and today I did. Watched it in 4DX and that just took the experience to another level entirely.Icredible action sequences, dogfights, cinematography, soundtrack and direction 👌🏻🔥🚀🛫 Next level stuff! Absolute MUST watch. If you can get motion seats, get them, or at least watch in IMAX or similar.

reviews.review_title: Absolutely worthy to go to the cinema for this
reviews.content: I'm not a fan of the top gun fist episode before, and before I watched this movie I have never watched the first one, so I wasn't having a high expectation on this movie. But after I have watched this one, I am completely thrilled. The movie is so touching and exciting that I never felt tired or bored though the whole time. I even forgot the time when it's over. I wanted to stand up and clap at the end. It is exciting and moving and I haven't felt this for years. The movie is so greatly and throughly made that it's absolutely worthy to go to the theater and watch on big screen. The characters are fun, and the boding between all these characters are huge. I'll say it's very relatable to most of people. You would definitely not regret for seeing this movie in the theater. I personally not a fan of military or Tom Cruis, but I have to say that this movie really caught me. And by the way the ending song by lady Gaga is fantastic too.

reviews.review_title: Top notch film...very much worth the wait...
reviews.content: This is the sequel the fans wanted. No political agenda, no social justice warrior garbage, just pure good old-fashioned American military might doing what they do best. Excellent closure for the main characters. And just like the original, this one will stand the test of time and be a forever classic.

reviews.review_title: IT'S A SUPER FUN MOVIE, not a film. It's a great summer opener.
reviews.content:
Top Gun 2 is definitely worth a theater ticket.It has the best camera work with flying that has ever happened. It is fueled by nostalgia in good and also cliche ways. The cliche cringe is definitely there, almost feels like it was made more for Tom than anyone else. It goes out of its way to make him more of the hero above anyone, like no other heroic moments could happen without him involved. Half of the cast is just happy to be there, but the other half has A list actors that seemed forced to give lackluster performances. At the same time, its effin Top Gun lmao
One main thing about the original that I overlooked until recently, is how they handle PTSD. He was, and still is messed up over Goose, but they refuse to talk about it directly. This would have been a good moment to discuss that about his character, to help it be relatable with our actual veterans. But, cliche comes back and you have to suck it up.It is formed like an 80's/90's action movie. It gives you those warm nostalgia feels, but you can also tell what is about to happen next just based on the timing of the plot.IT'S A SUPER FUN MOVIE, not a film. It's a great summer opener.They give love to Val, which was as good as a moment as they could have done, but shows how he doesnt have alot of time left. The mission itself is straight up a Mission Impossible kind of thing, so you can see how Tom was controlling the production. They have an unnamed enemy (RUSSIA) that they have a mission set for in the first ten mins, and what they are doing is IMPOSSIBLE. You almost expect them to say it too.Their target is basically just like the Death Star.It's more of an Ace Combat movie than Top Gun, the main mission is actually a ripoff from the last game. Ace Combat fans will understand. I'm actually re-downloading as you read...
STRONG 7/10, based on visuals and sound. Incredible.(The opening is an exact copy of the original and I loved it.)
Spoiler Alert!!!!!Hans Zimmer & Lady Gaga do the music?!?!?!

It's too late to get in the air force now. After watching this movie i became opsissed with aircrafts and i wich i can fly it. Tom cruise made a really good job.in this movie. The planes were very good and the stunts he did with them was awesome. The main charachter Maverick had a huge impact on me personally since the first movie. "talk to me goose" is the perfect line in it shows how much he is a good person and cares about his freinds even after 30 years. What made this movie so good is all the actors took a really intense training for month to shoot these scenes and Tom Cruise did too many dangerous moves.

I've been watching top gun since I was 7 thanks to an older sibling. By 8 I could quote the movie. I've been rewatching for 23 years. When I heard a sequel was coming out, I couldn't fathom they could continue the story and not ruin a classic. Maverick was probably the best sequel I've ever seen. They did a great job bringing the original top gun back to life, continuing the story in a way that respected the original but still kept you on the edge of your seat, and taking you on an emotional roller coaster ride. If you've seen Top Gun, maverick is a must see. If you haven't seen top gun yet, definitely watch it before seeing maverick.

I seriously have no words, this movie was outstanding. A sequel is hard to top the first movie but by god does this do it?? YES YES it does!!! 👍👍 I will be buying and watching it just as much as the first one which I've bought again in 4K. Just brilliant 👏

Top Gun was seen a a schlocky cheesefest when it came out. The sequel is no differentTrue, the new actors are filmed in actual F/A-18s. So mostly we just see them G-outThe end would have been cheesy for a video game.

reviews.review_title: The End of an Era of Dogfighting
reviews.content: Even in 1986, the original "Top Gun" had a slight vintage feel to it. Given how reminiscent of a bygone period its fighter-pilot training school setting was, the movie inserts an opening title card to make it clear that it takes place in the present. Even if "Top Gun" is heavily influenced by 1980s masculinity and Cold War-era jingoism, it also has the air of a genuine military spectacle that might have been produced by an earlier Hollywood studio structure. And now, 36 years later, "Top Gun: Maverick" gives a double dose of nostalgia - for both the 1980s original and the by-gone Americana it first inspired.The fact that "Top Gun: Maverick" doesn't take itself too seriously is one of its best qualities. Yes, if you choose to look for them, there are emotional throughlines (and meta connections), but there are also shirtless beach football games, sexy romance scenes, and characters that seem to have been plucked straight out of a 1940s WWII movie. Even though "Top Gun: Maverick's" realistic feats are comparable to those in the "Mission: Impossible" movies, "Maverick" stands out thanks to its purposely cheesy seriousness. And while that somewhat restricts how in-depth the movie can actually go with its plot, it nevertheless provides a welcome change of pace in a blockbuster world dominated by smirking, sardonic action movies.Even though it must have been absurdly difficult to film those plane acrobatics, "Top Gun: Maverick" excels because of its clarity. It is possible to follow the action visually, which is not often the case in high-budget action blockbusters. Additionally, and perhaps more importantly, it takes little mental effort to track emotional developments. (Predictability is both a benefit and a drawback in this case.) This is classic summer popcorn movie entertainment at its most exhilarating. And Cruise is merely the mission's main man.

reviews.review_title: incredible sequel to an iconic movie
reviews.content: Watched this with a group of around 15 and the direction, acting, plot, and of course the references to the original top gun make this just an all round amazing movie.

Could've been a one of a kind uplifting fast paced action movie but wasn't quite there. Something missing, budget issue might be. The usual plot no charisma, full of funny characters. More aerial actions would've been awesome. Choreography was strange felt like some of the scenes were shot under solar eclipse or something. Anyway It was a much anticipated movie for me since the covid period but disappointed.
Supposed to take place nowadays but the whole movie is from the 80s. It would have been great if it was filmed 5 years after the first oneNo action! No plot for me!

reviews.review_title: Luckily this is only a movie
reviews.content: In real life if a country rely only on expired soldier to train the new batch, this is very bad. No regeneration.In this movie, magic happens, Pete has not aged a bit even after a few decades, where the kid of his buddy has now grown to become a man. Even his colleague has grow grey hair and met godAnother joke is either the American military training is super bad or either the screenwriter is super bad.How could you not escort a buddy home knowing that his jet is damaged? You landed your jet first then let the nearly explode jet crash landed on the deck? What if there's an enemy jet coming again?What happen to leave nobody behind?
I was super pleased with this entire movie. Worth the wait and worth seeing in theater! Tom Cruise did awesome. It was put together well. Lots of laughs. I can't wait to watch it again.

reviews.review_title: Tom Cruise: What a genius of film maker u are !
reviews.content:
It's the first time I'm reviewing a movie on imdb but I really had to. See, as a fan of Top Gun, I couldn't believe what I saw. Always when a new sequel is made to an iconic movie, some might think that there was no need for it, and let's face it, most of movie series do not become like their first part..and the following parts may become distorted, vulgar, and unwatchable versions. This did not happen here with "Top Gun: Maverick."While watching Top Gun Maverick, I went through a lot of feelings "nostalgia, fun, enthusiasm, love, friendship, responsibility, patriotism, loyalty etc."
It was an interesting movie that took me back to the 90s without clichés. It was smooth without complications, but at the same time it made me realize more about the modern techniques of fighter planes and about fighter pilots and their emotions.I had no complaints about the romantic track between Tom Cruise and Jennifer Connelly
But what I really liked was the dialogue "It's time to let go" between Maverick and his friend, his "guardian angel" who always rushed to rescue when he did something unusual "Iceman " played by Val Kilmer "His presence was like a cherry on the cake despite his inability to speak due to his health condition, but it was a wonderful scene
loved it because pf the meaning behind it , We don't need to make our lives wasted by drowning in the spiral of the past, "as Maverick did .. Or sometimes I feel that it belongs to Tom personally, but I felt that it was one of his most sincere moments on the screen since his first appearance 40 years ago.Anyways i loved the film and loved every single performance,From Miles Teller to Jon Ham , Glen Powell.But, but, but, in the end, it is one man who has carried the entire film on his shoulders from the word "go."
BS : I 'm not convinced that this man is about to be 61 years old.

I haven't seen the original Top Gun (which i know is a sin lol) but i still understood the story well. The movie is filmed beautifully, which even saying that is an understatement, i mean cmon, they used real planes. The music was great, it's just such a good movie. And frankly, the ending left me in tears of joy, i loved it. And when it comes to movies i consider TG: M to be a jack of all trades. Action, Romance, Comedy, Intense, etc. The actors also went above and beyond for the movie as they literally learned how to fly for the sake of one movie, ONE MOVIE. Now of course it isn't the best movie of all time, that doesn't exist because nobody can agree on one movie but the point is it's a good movie, a great movie, hell there's no way to explain how good this movie is but still not perfect, no movie is.

reviews.review_title: Gladly some AvGeeks told me to go
reviews.content: I am typically not into military movies, but since so many avgeeks recommended Top Gun, I had to watch it.What a great movie, especially when it comes to the flying parts. You can really see and feel the efford, that went into producing this movie.Sure, it will probably not get the title for best story ever, but even there it was better then expected. Frequently connecting with its history while not pushing it to be the only reason, the movie exists.If you want to go to the movies this year, go for it!
A true blockbuster, popcorn, brain switch off movie that s worth the ticket! It is worth waiting 2 years to finally see this. I will try and see it in 4DX the first chance I get as well.

reviews.review_title: The First great Blockbuster of the Summer!
reviews.content: Top Gun: Maverick takes the classic formula set by its predecessor and finds a rarely achieved balance of fan services callbacks but introducing a timeless charm that is sure to age as well as the classic and its star.Tom is Tom, he does his thing and at this point, he's a movie genre within himself. The action is beautiful and absolutely worth paying extra for the IMAX experience. Joseph Kosinski felt like the perfect Director for this and I can't imagine anyone doing any better.This top tear team really put you in the cockpit for this one and its sure to inspire for generations to come.

Best sequel I have seen in my life. Story line....the flying with actual footage. .the acting all reflect properly to make this a classic. Tom Cruise never disappoints. The only two things I disliked was the closing song of Lady Gaga and the fact that China was.removed and replaced with Russia....other than that the movie hit the nail on the head... can't wait to watch it one more time
...

Watching the movie as Iranian, I noticed where they are talking about the Uranianm enrichment lcoation! Its Ferdo site in Qom in Iran! Iran made this site for their centrifuges in the hearth of mountains and also deep down underground to assure it will be impossible to be bombed by air. Oh well, they made a 130 minute film explaining how its done, and since Iranian military doesnt watch Hollywood films, they wont be aware that Ferdo is not safe anymore🤣 if they make a hollywood movie about it, its only matters of time to do it in real life😁
Amazed how great they put the plot together and make this an incredibly realistic mission without making it political (so easy for them to do it since the target is real) just to make sure all the focus of the film is set on the cast.Best action feel good hollywood movie I've seen in last 2 years! Well done!

reviews.review_title: Great movie for all tastes, action and drama
